When you make a substitution, you’ve got to go all the way and replace everything in the expression by things involving this new variable that I’ve introduced. So I’d better get rid of the cos x dx and rewrite it in terms of du or in terms of u. And I can do that because du, according to that formula, is cos x dx. Let me put a box around that. That’s our substitution.

当你进行代换时，你还需要计算代入变量的微分。所以这里出现的 cos x dx 就是 du。我用完全不涉及三角函数的东西代替了这个三角积分。这容易多了。我们可以直接代入我们在这里知道的东西。这是 u^(n+1) / (n+1) 加上一个常数，我已经完成了积分。

When you make a substitution, you also want to compute the differential of the variable that you substitute in. So the cos x dx that appears here is just, exactly, du. And I’ve replaced this trig integral with something that doesn’t involve trig functions at all. This is a lot easier. We can just plug into what we know here. This is u^(n+1) / (n+1) plus a constant, and I’ve done the integral.

但我还没有完全解决这个问题。因为为了对读者和你自己好，你应该在此时返回，可能的话，返回并删除你引入的这个新变量。你才是引入这个变量的人。除了你之外，没有人真正知道它是什么。但世界上其他人知道他们首先要求的涉及 x 的内容。

But I’m not quite done with the problem yet. Because to be nice to your reader and to yourself, you should go back at this point, probably, go back and get rid of this new variable that you introduced. You’re the one who introduced this variable, you. Nobody except you, really, knows what it is. But the rest of the world knows what they asked for the first place that involved x.

所以我必须回过头来把它去掉。在这种情况下这并不难，因为 u = sin x。所以我做了这个反向代换。这就是你得到的。所以这就是答案。好的，游戏是，我在这里使用这个余弦的奇次幂，我可以看到它作为正弦的微分出现。这就是使这个替换起作用的原因。

So I have to go back and get rid of this. And that’s not hard to do in this case, because u = sin x. And so I make this back substitution. And that’s what you get. So there’s the answer. OK, so the game was, I use this odd power of the cosine here, and I could see it appearing as the differential of the sine. So that’s what made this substitution work.

让我们再举一个例子，看看在稍微不同的情况下如何运作。这是另一个例子。现在我确实有一个奇数幂。其中一个指数是奇数，所以我处于简单情况。但它不是 1。现在的游戏是使用这个三角恒等式从这个奇数幂中去掉你能得到的最大的偶数幂。

Let’s do another example to see how that works out in a slightly different case. So here’s another example. Now I do have an odd power. One of the exponents is odd, so I’m in the easy case. But it’s not 1. The game now is to use this trig identity to get rid of the largest even power that you can, from this odd power here.

三角恒等式

Trig Identity

因此，使用 sin^2 x = 1 cos^2 x，从奇数幂中消除很多幂。看看会发生什么。所以这实际上不是替代或其他什么，这只是一个三角恒等式。这个正弦立方是正弦平方乘以正弦。正弦平方是 1 cos^2 x。然后我得到了剩余的 sin x。然后我得到了 cos^2 x dx。

So use sin^2 x = 1 cos^2 x, to eliminate a lot of powers from that odd power. Watch what happens. So this is not really a substitution or anything, this is just a trig identity. This sine cubed is sine squared times the sine. And the sine squared is 1 cos^2 x. And then I have the remaining sin x. And then I have cos^2 x dx.

让我稍微重写一下，看看它是怎么算出来的。这是 cos^2 x 减去的积分，然后是这两个的乘积。也就是 cos^4 x 乘以 sin x dx。所以现在我的情况和我刚才的情况完全一样。我得到了一个正弦或余弦的幂。这里碰巧是正弦。

So let me rewrite that a little bit to see how this works out. This is the integral of cos^2 x minus, and then there’s the product of these two. That’s cos^4 x times sin x dx. So now I’m really exactly in the situation that I was in over here. I’ve got a single power of a sine or cosine. It happens that it’s a sine here.

但这不会造成任何麻烦，我们可以继续玩我在那里玩的游戏。

But that’s not going to cause any trouble, we can go ahead and play the same game that I did there.

三角代换

Trig Substitution

到目前为止，我只是使用了三角恒等式。但现在我将使用三角代换。我想把它们写成变量的幂。然后这将是该变量的微分。所以我将 u 设为 cos x，这意味着 du = sin x dx。

So, so far I’ve just been using trig identities. But now I’ll use a trig substitution. And I think I want to write these as powers of a variable. And then this is going to be the differential of that variable. So I’ll take u to be cos x, and that means that du = sin x dx.

这就是代换。那么当我进行代换时，我们得到了什么呢？余弦平方变成 u^2。余弦的 4 次方变成 u^4，而 sin x dx 变成不完全是 du，注意符号，注意这里的减号。它变成了 du。但没关系。减号在外面。我可以对这两个幂求积分，所以我得到了 u^3 / 3。然后当我积分时，这个 4 次方会给我一个 5 次方。

There’s the substitution. So when I make that substitution, what do we get. Cosine squared becomes u^2. Cosine to the 4th becomes u^4, and sin x dx becomes not quite du, watch for the signum, watch for this minus sign here. It becomes du. But that’s OK. The minus sign comes outside. And I can integrate both of these powers, so I get u^3 / 3. And then this 4th power gives me a 5th power, when I integrate.

别忘了常数。我做完了吗？还没做完。我必须回代并去掉我选择的变量 u，用你的变量替换它。有问题吗？ 学生： 教授：确实应该有。我来这里的时候忘了这个减号。所以这两个加起来给了我一个加号。这也是另一个问题吗？谢谢。让我们回代。我要把它放在这里。

And don’t forget the constant. Am I done? Not quite done. I have to back substitute and get rid of my choice of variable, u, and replace it with yours. Questions? STUDENT: PROFESSOR: There should indeed. I forgot this minus sign when I came down here. So these two gang up to give me a plus. Was that what the other question was about, too? Thanks. So let’s back substitute. And I’m going to put that over here.

结果是，我只需用 x 的余弦代替 u。所以这是。cos^3(x) / 3 加上，谢谢，cos^5(x) / 5 + c。这就是答案。顺便说一句，你可以记住做积分的好处之一是检查答案相当容易。你总是可以区分你得到的东西，然后回去看看你是否得到了正确的结果。

And the result is, well, I just replace the u by cosine of x. So this is. cos^3(x) / 3 plus, thank you, cos^5(x) / 5 + c. And there’s the answer. By the way, you can remember one of the nice things about doing an integral is it’s fairly easy to check your answer. You can always differentiate the thing you get, and see whether you get the right thing when you go back.

如果您想检查工作，使用幂律和余弦微分规则回到这一点并不难。让我们再举一个例子，只是为了处理这个简单案例的一个例子，您可能一开始就想到了。假设我只想积分一个立方体。sin^3 x。看不到余弦。

It’s not too hard to use the power rules and the differentiation rule for the cosine to get back to this if you want to check the work. Let’s do one more example, just to handle an example of this easy case, which you might have thought of at first. Suppose I just want to integrate a cube. sin^3 x. No cosine in sight.

但是我确实有一个三角函数的奇数次幂，即正弦或余弦。所以我的情况比较简单。我建议的程序是，我想从 sin^3 中取出最大的偶数次幂。所以我会把它取出来，也就是 sin^2，然后把它写成 1 cos^2。好吧，现在我很高兴。因为这就像我们在黑板上遇到的情况一样。

But I do have an odd power of a trig function, of a sine or cosine. So I’m in the easy case. And the procedure that I was suggesting says I want to take out the largest even power that I can, from the sin^3. So I’ll take that out, that’s a sin^2, and write it as 1 cos^2. Well, now I’m very happy. Because it’s just like the situation we had somewhere on the board here.

这就像我们上面遇到的情况一样。我得到了余弦乘以 sin x dx 的幂。因此，完全相同的替换开始起作用。你得到，也许你可以看到不做功会发生什么。我要在这里做功吗？我做了相同的替换。因此，这是 (1 u (1 u^2) 乘以 du。

It’s just like the situation we had up here. I’ve got a power of a cosine times sin x dx. So exactly the same substitution steps in. You get, and maybe you can see what happens without doing the work. Shall I do the work here? I make the same substitution. And so this is (1 u (1 u^2) times du.

即 uu^3 / 3。但我想把这个减号放在原处，这样就得到了 u + u^3 / 3 加上一个常数。然后我代入并得到 cos x + cos^3 x / 3。所以这是最简单的情况。如果你有一些奇数幂可以玩，那么你可以利用它，这很简单。

Which is u u^3 / 3. But then I want to put this minus sign in place, and so that gives me u + u^3 / 3 plus a constant. And then I back substitute and get cos x + cos^3 x / 3. So this is the easy case. If you have some odd power to play with, then you can make use of it and it’s pretty straightforward.

好的，更难的情况是没有奇数幂的情况。那么程序是什么呢？我将处理更难的情况，然后我将向你们展示一个如何积分平方根的例子。并使用三角学中的这些思想来做一个应用。所以我想保留这块黑板。也许我会回来重新从这里开始。更难的情况是它们只有偶数指数的情况。

OK the harder case is when you don’t have an odd power. So what’s the program? I’m going to do the harder case, and then I’m going to show you an example of how to integrate square roots. And do an application, using these ideas from trigonometry. So I want to keep this blackboard. Maybe I’ll come back and start here again. So the harder case is when they’re only even exponents.

我仍在尝试对相同形式进行积分。但现在所有指数都是偶数。所以我们必须玩个游戏。这里的游戏是使用半角公式。我刚刚非常遗憾地把它从黑板上抹掉了。也许我会在这里重写它们，这样我们就可以把它们写在黑板上。我想我记得它们是什么。

I’m still trying to integrate the same form. But now all the exponents are even. So we have to do some game. And here the game is use the half angle formula. Which I just erased, very sadly, on the board here. Maybe I’ll rewrite them over here so we have them on the board. I think I remember what they were.

所以游戏就是我要使用半角公式开始消除那些偶数幂。半角公式写成这样，确切地说，谈论的是。它重写了正弦和余弦的偶数幂。让我们通过一个例子看看它是如何工作的。先从余弦平方开始怎么样。怎么办？我什么也得不到。

So the game is I’m going to use that half angle formula to start getting rid of those even powers. Half angle formula written like this, exactly, talks about. it rewrites even powers of sines and cosines. So let’s see how that works out in an example. How about just the cosine squared for a start. What to do? I can’t pull anything out.

我可以将其改写为 1 sin^2，但这样我就得求 sin^2 的积分，这同样困难。所以，让我们在这里使用这个公式。这实际上与 (1+cos(2theta)) / 2 相同。现在，这很容易。它由两部分组成。求一半的积分可以得到 theta。哦。奇迹般地，x 变成了 theta。让我们把它放回 x。

I could rewrite this as 1 sin^2, but then I’d be faced with integrating the sin^2, which is exactly as hard. So instead, let’s use this formula here. This is really the same as (1+cos(2theta)) / 2. And now, this is easy. It’s got two parts to it. Integrating one half gives me theta over. Oh. Miraculously, the x turned into a theta. Let’s put it back as x.

我通过积分 1/2 得到 x/2。所以，请注意，当我进行这些偶数积分时，这里会发生一些非三角函数。出现 x/2。然后是另一个，好吧，这需要一点思考。余弦的积分是正弦，还是减去正弦。负正弦。我们要投票吗？我认为是正数。所以你得到了 sin(2x)，但这是真的吗？除以 2。如果我对 sin(2x) 进行微分，就会得到这个 2。

I get x/2 by integrating 1/2. So, notice that something non trigonometric occurs here when I do these even integrals. x/2 appears. And then the other one, OK, so this takes a little thought. The integral of the cosine is the sine, or is it minus the sine. Negative sine. Shall we take a vote? I think it’s positive. And so you get sin(2x), but is that right? Over 2. If I differentiate the sin(2x), this 2 comes out.

这会给我一个额外的 2。所以当我积分时，我必须在这里放入一个额外的 2。这就是答案。这不是替换。我只是在这里玩了三角恒等式。然后做了一个简单的三角积分，请你帮忙把符号弄对。想想这个 2 会做什么。它在分母中产生一个 2。但这并没有应用任何复杂的东西。

And would give me an extra 2 here. So there’s an extra 2 that I have to put in here when I integrate it. And there’s the answer. This is not a substitution. I just played with trig identities here. And then did a simple trig integral, getting your help to get the sign right. And thinking about what this 2 is going to do. It produces a 2 in the denominator. But it’s not applying any complicated thing.

这只是使用这个恒等式。让我们再举一个稍微难一点的例子。这次是 sin^2 乘以 cos^2。同样，没有奇数幂。我必须再努力一点。我要做的就是应用上面的那些恒等式。现在，我建议在这种情况下做的是转到某个地方。做一些侧面的工作。因为这一切都只是玩三角函数。

It’s just using this identity. Let’s do another example that’s a little bit harder. This time, sin^2 times cos^2. Again, no odd powers. I’ve got to work a little bit harder. And what I’m going to do is apply those identities up there. Now, what I recommend doing in this situation is going over to the side somewhere. And do some side work. Because it’s all just playing with trig functions.

它实际上暂时不做任何积分。所以，我猜想摆脱 sin^2 和 cos^2 的一种方法是使用这些恒等式，让我们这样做。所以正弦是 (1 cos(2x)) / 2。余弦是 (1 + cos(2x)) / 2。所以我只需将它们代入即可。现在我可以将其相乘。我得到的是差乘以和。所以你知道一个公式。

It’s not actually doing any integrals for a while. So, I guess one way to get rid of the sin^2 and the cos^2 is to use those identities and so let’s do that. So the sine is (1 cos(2x)) / 2. And the cosine is (1 + cos(2x)) / 2. So I just substitute them in. And now I can multiply that out. And what I have is a difference times a sum. So you know a formula for that.

取这两个数的乘积，分母中就会是 4。然后分子中，我得到这个的平方减去这个的平方。(ab)(a+b) = a^2 b^2。= 所以我得到了这个。好吧，我稍微高兴了一点，因为至少我没有得到 4。我没有 2 个不同的平方。我还有一个平方，我想对它求积分。我仍然不是简单的情况。

Taking the product of these two things, well there’ll be a 4 in the denominator. And then in the numerator, I get the square of this minus the square of this. (a b)(a+b) = a^2 b^2. = So I get that. Well, I’m a little bit happier, because at least I don’t have 4. I don’t have 2 different squares. I still have a square, and want to integrate this. I’m still not in the easy case.

我又回到了一个更简单的难题。但我们确实知道该怎么做。因为我刚刚做了。我可以利用我们得到的这个公式。但我认为在这里继续计算同样容易。再次使用半角公式，然后继续。所以我从这个位得到了 1/4。然后减去 cos^2(2x) 的 1/4。

I got myself back to an easier hard case. But we do know what to do about this. Because I just did it up there. And I could play into this formula that we got. But I think it’s just as easy to continue to calculate here. Use the half angle formula again for this, and continue on your way. So I get a 1/4 from this bit. And then minus 1/4 of cos^2(2x).

当我在顶板上代入 2x 作为 theta 时，我将在右侧得到 4x。所以它就是这样的。我想我可以再简化一点。这是 1/4。哦，但这里有一个 2。它是它的一半。所以我可以再简化一点。它是 1/4 1/8，也就是 1/8。然后我有 1/8 cos(4x)。好的，这是我的副业。

And when I plug in 2x in for theta, there in the top board, I’m going to get a 4x on the right hand side. So it comes out like that. And I guess I could simplify that a little bit more. This is a 1/4. Oh, but then there’s a 2 here. It’s half that. So then I can simplify a little more. It’s 1/4 1/8, which is 1/8. And then I have 1/8 cos(4x). OK, that’s my side work.

我刚刚在这里做了一些三角恒等式。并将正弦平方乘以余弦平方重写为不涉及三角幂的东西，只涉及余弦本身。还有一个常数。所以我可以把它代入这里。现在积分就很容易了。1/8，cos(4x) / 8，dx，也就是说，1/8 将得到 x/8。积分或余弦是正弦的正负。

I just did some trig identities over here. And rewrote sine squared times cosine squared as something which involves just no powers of trig, just cosine by itself. And a constant. So I can take that and substitute it in here. And now the integration is pretty easy. 1/8, cos(4x) / 8, dx, which is, OK the 1/8 is going to give me x/8. The integral or cosine is plus or minus the sine.

正弦的导数是加上余弦。所以它将是加上。只是这里有一个减号。所以它将是正弦。减去 sin(4x) / 8，但分母中还有一个额外的因子。它会是什么？我必须在那里放一个 4。所以我们也做了这个计算。所以这些中的任何一个。

The derivative of the sine is plus the cosine. So it’s going to be plus the. Only there’s a minus here. So it’s going to be the sine. minus sin(4x) / 8, but then I have an additional factor in the denominator. And what’s it going to be? I have to put a 4 there. So we’ve done that calculation, too. So any of these.

如果你继续进行这种过程，这两种程序，你现在可以用这些想法对任何包含正弦幂乘以余弦幂的表达式进行积分。现在，让我们看看。哦，让我给你一个替代方法来解决最后一个问题。我知道我会怎么做。让我给你一个替代方法来做那边的附带工作。

If you keep doing this kind of process, these two kinds of procedures, you can now integrate any expression that has a power of a sine times a power of a cosine in it, by using these ideas. Now, let’s see. Oh, let me give you an alternate method for this last one here. I know what I’ll do. Let me give an alternate method for doing, really doing the side work over there.

我正在尝试处理 sin^2 乘以 cos^2。好吧，这是 sin x cos x 的平方。sin x cos x 就出现在这里。在另一个三角恒等式中。所以我们也可以利用它。这将正弦和余弦的因数数量减少了 1。所以它朝着正确的方向发展。这等于 1/2 sin(2x) 的平方。正弦乘以余弦等于 1/2。说得对。

I’m trying to deal with sin^2 times cos^2. Well that’s the square of sin x cos x. And sin x cos x shows up right here. In another trig identity. So we can make use of that, too. That reduces the number of factors of sines and cosines by 1. So it’s going in the right direction. This is equal to 1/2 sin(2x), squared. Sine times cosine is 1/2. Say this right.

它是 sin(2x) / 2，然后我要求它的平方。所以我得到的结果是 sin^2(2x) / 4。嗯，我还不太高兴，因为我还有偶数幂。记住，我最终试图对这个东西求积分，偶数幂是不好的。我试图摆脱它们。通过使用那个公式，半角公式。所以我可以再次将它应用于 sin x。

It’s sin(2x) / 2, and then I want to square that. So what I get is sin^2(2x) / 4. Which is, well, I’m not too happy yet, because I still have an even power. Remember I’m trying to integrate this thing in the end, even powers are bad. I try to get rid of them. By using that formula, the half angle formula. So I can apply that to sin x here again.

我得到了 (1 cos(4x)) / 2 的 1/4。这就是半角公式对 sin^2(2x) 的解释。这也和我在这里得到的表达式完全相同。它和我那里的表达式相同。所以它和我这里的表达式相同。所以这只是使用半角公式玩游戏的另一种方法。

I get 1/4 of (1 cos(4x)) / 2. That’s what the half angle formula says for sin^2(2x). And that’s exactly the same as the expression that I got up here, as well. It’s the same expression that I have there. So it’s the same expression as I have here. So this is just an alternate way to play this game of using the half angle formula.

例子

Example

好的，让我们来应用一下这些东西，稍微改变一下话题。这就是问题所在。这是实际三角代换的一个应用和例子。这就是我要研究的问题。好的，我有一个半径为 a 的圆。我从中切出一个标签，就在这里。这个标签在这里。这个东西的高度是 b。

OK, let’s do a little application of these things and change the topic a little bit. So here’s the problem. So this is an application and example of a real trig substitution. So here’s the problem I want to look at. OK, so I have a circle whose radius is a. And I cut out from it a sort of tab, here. This tab here. And the height of this thing is b.

所以这个长度是一个数字 b。我想要计算这个小凸片的面积。这就是问题所在。这里有一个圆弧。我想要求出这个圆弧的面积，即 a 和 b，以 a 和 b 为单位。所以面积，嗯，我猜计算面积的一种方法是取 y dx 的积分。

So this length is a number b. And what I want to do is compute the area of that little tab. That’s the problem. So there’s an arc over here. And I want to find the area of this, for a and b, in terms of a and b. So the area, well, I guess one way to compute the area would be to take the integral of y dx.

你已经看到了将其分成垂直条带的想法，其高度由函数 y(x) 给出。然后你对其进行积分。这是对积分的解释。面积由 y dx 给出。但这有点尴尬，因为我的 y 公式会有点奇怪。它是常数，b 的值，沿着这里，然后在这一点上它变成了圆的弧。

You’ve seen the idea of splitting this up into vertical strips whose height is given by a function y(x). And then you integrate that. That’s an interpretation for the integral. The area is given by y dx. But that’s a little bit awkward, because my formula for y is going to be a little strange. It’s constant, value of b, along here, and then at this point it becomes this arc, of the circle.

因此，我可以解决这个问题，但有点尴尬，因为将 y 表示为 x 的函数，这个形状的顶部边缘有点尴尬，需要两个不同的区域来表达。所以，另一种说法是说 x dy。也许这样效果会更好一点。或者可能不会，但值得一试。我也可以把这个区域分成水平条带。

So working this out, I could do it but it’s a little awkward because expressing y as a function of x, the top edge of this shape, it’s a little awkward, and takes two different regions to express. So, a different way to say it is to say x dy. Maybe that’ll work a little bit better. Or maybe it won’t, but it’s worth trying. I could just as well split this region up into horizontal strips.

其宽度为 dy，长度为 x。现在我把它看作 y 的函数。这是 y 函数的图形。这样就好多了，因为 y 函数是 a^2 y^2 的平方根，不是吗？即 x^2 + y^2 = a^2。这就是 x。这就是我要积分的。(a^2 y^2) 的平方根，dy。

Whose width is dy, and whose length is x. Now I’m thinking of this as a function of y. This is the graph of a function of y. And that’s much better, because the function of y is, well, it’s the square root of a^2 y^2, isn’t it. That’s x^2 + y^2 = a^2. So that’s what x is. And that’s what I’m asked to integrate, then. Square root of (a^2 y^2), dy.

我甚至可以代入积分极限。也许我应该这样做，因为这应该是一个实际数字。我想我从 y = 0 开始积分，就是这里。到 y = b, dy。这就是我想要找到的。这是该区域面积的积分公式。这是一种新形式。我认为你以前没有想过在这门课上对这样的表达式进行积分。

And I can even put in limits of integration. Maybe I should do that, because this is supposed to be an actual number. I guess I’m integrating it from y = 0, that’s here. To y = b, dy. So this is what I want to find. This is a integral formula for the area of that region. And this is a new form. I don’t think that you’ve thought about integrating expressions like this in this class before.

所以，这是一种新的形式，我想向你们展示如何做到这一点，它与三角学有什么关系。它与三角学的关系是通过我们在黑板上看到的那幅精确的图片。毕竟，这个 a^2 y^2 是这个弧的公式。所以我的建议是，我们尝试利用与圆的联系并引入极坐标。所以，如果我测量这个角度，那么你可以说各种各样的事情。

So, it’s a new form and I want to show you how to do it, how it’s related to trigonometry. It’s related to trigonometry through that exact picture that we have on the blackboard. After all, this a^2 y^2 is the formula for this arc. And so, what I propose is that we try to exploit the connection with the circle and introduce polar coordinates. So, here if I measure this angle then there are various things you can say.

比如这里这个点的坐标是 a cos(theta)，a。嗯，很抱歉，不是。这是一个角度，但我想称它为 theta_0。而且，一般来说，你知道这个点的坐标是 (a cos(theta)，a sin(theta))。如果半径是 a，那么这里的角度就是 theta。所以 x = a cos(theta)，y = a sin(theta)，仅从圆的几何形状来看。所以让我们进行替换。

Like the coordinates of this point here are a cos(theta), a. Well, I’m sorry, it’s not. That’s an angle, but I want to call it theta_0. And, in general you know that the coordinates of this point are (a cos(theta), a sin(theta)). If the radius is a, then the angle here is theta. So x = a cos(theta), and y = a sin(theta), just from looking at the geometry of the circle. So let’s make that substitution.

Y = a sin(theta)。我用这幅图来说明，也许进行替换是一件好事。让我们继续看下去，看看会发生什么。如果这是真的，我们感兴趣的是积分 a^2 y^2。也就是 a^2。我们感兴趣的是积分 a^2 y^2 的平方根。也就是 a^2 减去这个的平方根。a^2 sin^2(theta)。嗯，这等于 a cos theta。这只是 sin^2 + cos^2 = 1，又一次。

Y = a sin(theta). I’m using the picture to suggest that maybe making the substitution is a good thing to do. Let’s follow along and see what happens. If that’s true, what we’re interested in is integrating, a^2 y^2. Which is a^2. We’re interested in integrating the square root of a^2 y^2. Which is the square root of a^2 minus this. a^2 sin^2(theta). And, well, that’s equal to a cos theta. That’s just sin^2 + cos^2 = 1, all over again.

它也是 x。这是 x。这是 x。因此，有很多不同的方式来思考这个问题。但无论你怎么说，我们试图积分的东西，a^2 y^2，在这个替换下是 cos(theta)。所以我感兴趣的是积分 (a^2 y^2) 的平方根 dy。我将进行这个替换 y = a sin(theta)。

It’s also x. This is x. And this was x. So there are a lot of different ways to think of this. But no matter how you say it, the thing we’re trying to integrate, a^2 y^2 is, under this substitution it is a cos(theta). So I’m interested in integrating the square root of (a^2 y^2), dy. And I’m going to make this substitution y = a sin(theta).

因此，根据该替换，我已确定 a^2 y^2 的平方根是 cos(theta)。就是这样。dy 呢？好吧，我最好计算 dy。因此，dy，只需区分这个表达式，就是 cos(theta) d theta。因此，让我们将其代入。dy = a cos(theta) d theta。好的。进行三角替换，y = a sin(theta)，已替换了其中有平方根的积分。并且没有三角函数。

And so under that substitution, I’ve decided that the square root of a^2 y^2 is a cos(theta). That’s this. What about the dy? Well, I’d better compute the dy. So dy, just differentiating this expression, is a cos(theta) d theta. So let’s put that in. dy = a cos(theta) d theta. OK. Making that trig substitution, y = a sin(theta), has replaced this integral that has a square root in it. And no trig functions.

积分不涉及平方根，只涉及三角函数。事实上，由于我们已经完成的工作，现在积分并不太难。a^2 出来了。这是 cos^2(theta) d theta。也许我们今天已经做过这个例子了。我想我们已经做过了。也许我们可以仔细考虑一下，但也许最简单的方法是回顾笔记，看看我们之前得到了什么。

With an integral that involves no square roots and only trig functions. In fact, it’s not too hard to integrate this now, because of the work that we’ve done. The a^2 comes out. This is cos^2(theta) d theta. And maybe we’ve done that example already today. I think we have. Maybe we can think it through, but maybe the easiest thing is to look back at notes and see what we got before.

这是我在困难情况下做的第一个例子。结果，我当时用 x 代替了 theta。所以这是一个很好的进步。我从这个积分开始，我真的不知道如何用我们迄今为止所用的任何方法计算它。我用我们知道如何计算的三角积分代替了它。现在我已经完成了那个三角积分。

That was the first example in the hard case that I did. And what it came out to, I used x instead of theta at the time. So this is a good step forward. I started with this integral that I really didn’t know how to do by any means that we’ve had so far. And I’ve replaced it by a trig integral that we do know how to do. And now I’ve done that trig integral.

但是我们还没有完全完成，因为还有代入问题。我想回过头来用原始变量 y 重写这个公式。或者，我想回过头来用原始问题中的原始积分极限重​​写这个公式。这样做时，重写这个表达式并去掉 sin(2theta) 会很有用。

But we’re still not quite done, because of the problem of back substituting. I’d like to go back and rewrite this in terms of the original variable, y. Or, I’d like to go back and rewrite it in terms of the original limits of integration that we had in the original problem. In doing that, it’s going to be useful to rewrite this expression and get rid of the sin(2theta).

毕竟，原始 y 是用 sin(theta) 而不是 sin(2theta) 来表示的。所以让我在这里这样做，并说这反过来等于 a^2 theta / 2 加上 sin(2theta) = 2 sin(theta) cos(theta)。因此，当分母为 4 时，我得到的是 sin(theta) cos(theta) / 2。我这样做是因为我越来越接近问题开始时的原始项。即 sin(theta)。

After all, the original y was expressed in terms of sin(theta), not sin(2theta). So let me just do that here, and say that this, in turn, is equal to a^2 theta / 2 plus, well, sin(2theta) = 2 sin(theta) cos(theta). And so, when there’s a 4 in the denominator, what I’ll get is sin(theta) cos(theta) / 2. I did that because I’m getting closer to the original terms that the problem started with. Which was sin(theta).

那么让我写下我们现在得到的积分。a^2 y^2 的平方根 dy 到目前为止，我们知道的是 a^2 (theta / 2 + sin(theta) cos(theta) / 2) + c。但我想回过头来用原始值重写它。原始变量 y。那么，用 y 表示的 theta 是什么？让我们看看。用 theta 表示的 y 是这样的。

So let me write down the integral that we have now. The square root of a^2 y^2, dy is, so far, what we know is a^2 (theta / 2 + sin(theta) cos(theta) / 2) + c. But I want to go back and rewrite this in terms of the original value. The original variable, y. Well, what is theta in terms of y? Let’s see. y in terms of theta was given like this.

那么，就 y 而言，theta 是多少？啊。所以，这里可怕的反正弦出现了，对吧？Theta 是满足 y = a sin(theta) 的角度。这意味着 theta 是 y/a 的反正弦，或正弦的倒数。所以，这是这里出现的第一件事。arcsin(y/a)，除以 2。这就是这个术语。Theta 是 arcsin(y/a) / 2。那么，另一边呢？

So what is theta in terms of y? Ah. So here the fearsome arcsine rears its head, right? Theta is the angle so that y = a sin(theta). So that means that theta is the arcsine, or sine inverse, of y/a. So that’s the first thing that shows up here. arcsin(y/a), all over 2. That’s this term. Theta is arcsin(y/a) / 2. What about the other side, here?

好吧，我们知道正弦和余弦在 y 和 x 方面的含义，如果你愿意的话。也许我会把 a^2 放在这里。这样会更好一些。另外，另一个项是 a^2 sin(theta) cos(theta)。所以 a sin(theta) 就是 y。也许我会这样写 (a sin(theta)) (a cos(theta)) / 2 + c。这样我得到了相同的结果。现在这里是 a sin(theta)，也就是 y。

Well sine and cosine, we knew what they were in terms of y and in terms of x, if you like. Maybe I’ll put the a^2 inside here. That makes it a little bit nicer. Plus, and the other term is a^2 sin(theta) cos(theta). So the a sin(theta) is just y. Maybe I’ll write this (a sin(theta)) (a cos(theta)) / 2 + c. And so I get the same thing. And now here a sin(theta), that’s y.

那么 a cos(theta) 是什么？它是 x，或者，如果你愿意，它是 a^2 y^2 的平方根。所以我把一切都重写了，回到原始变量 y 方面。这就是答案。所以我做了这种形式的不定积分。这个二次函数，这个某个常数减去 y^2 的平方根。每当你看到它时，都要想到三角函数。这将与 sin^2 + cos^2 恒等式有关。

And what’s the a cos(theta)? It’s x, or, if you like, it’s the square root of a^2 y^2. And so there I’ve rewritten everything, back in terms of the original variable, y. And there’s an answer. So I’ve done this indefinite integration of a form. of this quadratic, this square root of something which is a constant minus y^2. Whenever you see that, the thing to think of is trigonometry. That’s going to play into the sin^2 + cos^2 identity.

利用它的方法是进行替换 y = a sin(theta)。如果您愿意，也可以进行替换 y = a cos(theta)。最终结果将完全相同。我还没有完全解决我遇到的原始问题，因为原始问题要求确定积分。所以让我们回过头来把它也完成。

And the way to exploit it is to make the substitution y = a sin(theta). You could also make a substitution y = a cos(theta), if you wanted to. And the result would come out to exactly the same in the end. I’m still not quite done with the original problem that I had, because the original problem asked for a definite integral. So let’s just go back and finish that as well.

所以面积就是这个平方根从 0 到 b 的积分。所以我只想在这里求右边的值。我们得出的答案，这个不定积分。我想在 0 和 b 处求它的值。好吧，让我们看看。

So the area was the integral from 0 to b of this square root. So I just want to evaluate the right hand side here. The answer that we came up with, this indefinite integral. I want to evaluate it at 0 and at b. Well, let’s see.

当我在 b 处求值时，我得到 a^2 arcsin(b/a) / 2 加上 y，也就是 b，乘以 a^2 b^2 的平方根，将 y = b 除以 2。因此，我将 y = b 代入该公式，这就是我得到的结果。然后，当我代入 y = 0 时，0 的正弦为 0，因此 0 的反正弦为 0。因此，这个项消失了。

When I evaluate it at b, I get a^2 arcsin(b/a) / 2 plus y, which is b, times the square root of a^2 b^2, putting y = b, divided by 2. So I’ve plugged in y = b into that formula, this is what I get. Then when I plug in y = 0, well the, sine of 0 is 0, so the arcsine of 0 is 0. So this term goes away.

当 y = 0 时，这个项也为 0。所以我根本没有得到任何减法项。所以有一个表达式。请注意，这个 arcsin(b/a) 就是这个角度。arcsin(b/a) 是 y = b 时得到的角度。所以这个 theta 就是 arcsin(b/a)。把它放在这里。那就是 theta_0。这就是角形成的角度。

And when y = 0, this term is 0 also. And so I don’t get any subtracted terms at all. So there’s an expression for this. Notice that this arcsin(b/a), that’s exactly this angle. arcsin(b/a), it’s the angle that you get when y = b. So this theta is the arcsin(b/a). Put this over here. That is theta_0. That is the angle that the corner makes.

因此，我可以将其重写为 a^2 theta_0 / 2 加上 b 乘以 a^2 b^2 的平方根，除以 2。让我们想一想。我的和式中有这两个项，这样合理吗？第一个项是 a^2。它是半径平方乘以这个角度，再乘以 1/2。嗯，我认为这就是这个扇区的面积。a^2 theta / 2 是扇区面积的公式。

So I could rewrite this as a^2 theta_0 / 2 plus b times the square root of a^2 b^2, over 2. Let’s just think about this for a minute. I have these two terms in the sum, is that reasonable? The first term is a^2. That’s the radius squared times this angle, times 1/2. Well, I think that is exactly the area of this sector. a^2 theta / 2 is the formula for the area of the sector.

这个是垂直高度。这是水平高度。a^2 b^2 是这个距离。a^2 b^2 的平方根。所以右边项是 b 乘以 a^2 b^2 的平方根除以 2，这就是三角形的面积。所以用一点几何知识就可以得到与所有这些复杂的微积分相同的答案。也许这足以让我们今天就此结束。

And this one, this is the vertical elevation. This is the horizontal. a^2 b^2 is this distance. Square root of a^2 b^2. So the right hand term is b times the square root of a^2 b^2 divided by 2, that’s the area of that triangle. So using a little bit of geometry gives you the same answer as all of this elaborate calculus. Maybe that’s enough cause for celebration for us to quit for today.

Lec 28 | MIT 18.01 单变量微积分，2007 年秋季

Lec 28 | MIT 18.01 Single Variable Calculus, Fall 2007
