简介

Intro

以下内容根据 Creative Commons 许可提供。您的支持将帮助 MIT OpenCourseWare 继续免费提供高质量的教育资源。要捐款或查看数百门 MIT 课程的其他材料，请访问 MIT OpenCourseWare，网址为 ocw.mit.edu。

The following content is provided under a Creative Commons license. Your support will help MIT OpenCourseWare continue to offer high quality educational resources for free. To make a donation or to view additional materials from hundreds of MIT courses, visit MIT OpenCourseWare at ocw.mit.edu.

三角积分

Trig integrals

教授：我们将继续讨论三角积分和三角代换。

PROFESSOR: So we’re going to continue to talk about trig integrals and trig substitutions.

这也许是本课程最技术性的部分，也许这就是为什么杰里森教授决定暂时离开，让我来接替他。但我会尽力帮助你学习这项技术，这对你很有用。昨天我们讨论了涉及正弦和余弦的三角积分。还有另一个涉及其他三角多项式的世界。三角函数、正割和正切。

This is maybe the most technical part of this course, which maybe is why professor Jerison decided to just take a leave, go AWOL just now and let me take over for him. But I’ll do my best to help you learn this technique and it’ll be useful for you. So we’ve talked about trig integrals involving sines and cosines yesterday. There’s another whole world out there that involves these other trig polynomials. trig functions, secant and tangent.

让我做一个小表格来提醒你它们是什么。因为我自己记性不好，所以我喜欢有机会回过头来提醒自己这些东西。让我们看看。正割是那些东西之一的 1，它是哪一个？很奇怪，它是余弦的 1。余割是正弦的 1。

Let me just make a little table to remind you what they are. Because I have trouble remembering myself, so I enjoy the opportunity to go back to remind myself of this stuff. Let’s see. The secant is one over one of those things, which one is it? It’s weird, it’s 1 over the cosine. And the cosecant is 1 over the sin.

三角恒等式

Trig identities

当然，我们知道切线。

Of course the tangent, we know.

它是正弦除以余弦，而余切则相反。所以当你在它前面加上一个“co”时，它交换了正弦和余弦。好吧，我上面准备好的那块小黑板上有几个涉及正切和正割的恒等式。也许我会仔细检查一下，以确保我们都同意它们。

It’s the sine over the cosine and the cotangent is the other way around. So when you put a “co” in front of it, it exchanges sine and cosine. Well, I have a few identities involving tangent and secant up there, in that little prepared blackboard up above. Maybe I’ll just go through and check that out to make sure that we’re all on the same page with them.

所以我要说的是，上面有一个三角恒等式。正割平方等于 1 加正切。我们来看一下。正割等于 1 除以余弦，所以正割平方等于 1 除以余弦平方。然后，每当你在三角函数中看到 1 时，你总是可以选择写成 cos^2 + sin^2。如果我这样做，那么我就可以将 cos^2 除以第一项。

So I’m going to claim that there’s this trig identity at the top. Secant squared is 1 plus the tangent. So let’s just check that out. So the secant is 1 over the cosine, so secant squared is 1 over cosine squared. And then whenever you see a 1 in trigonometry, you’ll always have the option of writing as cos^2 + sin^2. And if I do that, then I can divide the cos^2 into that first term.

我得到 1 + sin^2 / cos^2。/ ^2。这是正切平方。所以就是这样。这检查了第一个。这就是我今天要讲的主要三角恒等式。这是三角恒等式部分。这部分微积分怎么样。我们可以计算 tan x 的导数吗？实际上，我将在这个板上做这件事。所以 tan x = sin x / cos x。

And I get 1 + sin^2 / cos^2. / ^2. Which is the tangent squared. So there you go. That checks the first one. That’s the main trig identity that’s going to be behind what I talk about today. That’s the trigonometry identity part. How about this piece of calculus. Can we calculate what the derivative of tan x is? Actually, I’m going to do that on this board. So tan x = sin x / cos x.

所以当我们学习商法则时，我想你们是理解的。计算商的导数。规则是，你取分子，然后……对不起，你取分子的导数，也就是余弦。然后你将其乘以分母，这样就得到 cos^2。然后你取分子，减去分子，再乘以分母的导数，也就是 sin x。

So I think I was with you when we learned about the quotient rule.computing the derivative of a quotient. And the rule is, you take the numerator and you. sorry, you take the derivative of the numerator, which is cosine. And you multiply it by the denominator, so that gives you cos^2. And then you take the numerator, take minus the numerator, and multiply that by the derivative of the denominator, which is sin x.

然后把所有这些放在分母的平方上。现在我看着它，眼前出现了相同的三角恒等式，cos^2 + sin^2 = 1。这是 1 / cos^2(x)，即割线平方。很好。所以这就是声明的内容。正切的导数是割线平方。这立即给你一个积分。也就是说，割线平方的积分就是正切。

And you put all that over the square of the denominator. And now I look at that and before my eyes I see the same trig identity, cos^2 + sin^2 = 1, appearing there. This is 1 / cos^2(x) which is secant squared. And, good. So that’s what the claim was. The derivative of the tangent is the secant squared. That immediately gives you an integral. Namely, the integral of secant squared is the tangent.

这是微积分的基本定理。所以我们在那里验证了第一个积分。好吧，让我们也做第二个。所以如果我想微分正割，正割的导数。那就是 d/dx 除以 1 的余弦。同样，我有一个商。这个稍微容易一些，因为分子很简单。

That’s the fundamental theorem of calculus. So we verified the first integral there. Well, let’s just do the second one as well. So if I want to differentiate the secant, derivative of the secant. So that’s d/dx of 1 over the cosine. And again, I have a quotient. This one’s a little easier because the numerator’s so simple.

所以我取分子的导数，结果是 0。然后我取分子，用分子减去分母导数的乘积。也就是 sin x，然后把所有的结果放在同一个分母的平方上。所以一个减号来自商法则，另一个来自余弦的导数。

So I take the derivative of the numerator, which is 0. And then I take the numerator, I take minus the numerator times the derivative of the denominator. Which is sin x, and put all that over the square of the same denominator. So one minus sign came from the quotient rule, and the other one came because that’s the derivative of the cosine.

但是它们相消了，所以我得到了 sin / cos^2，也就是 sin / cos 乘以 1 / cos，所以这就是割线，也就是 1 / cos 乘以 tan x。所以，不难。这验证了割线的导数就是割线正切。如果你想知道的话，它会告诉你那个奇怪的东西的积分，割线正切的积分就是割线。

But they cancel, and so I get sin / cos^2, which is sin / cos times 1 / cos and so that’s the secant, that’s 1 / cos, times tan x. So, not hard. That verifies that the derivative of secant is secant tangent. And it tells you that the integral of that weird thing in case you ever want to know, the integral of the secant tangent is the secant.

正切积分

Tangent integrals

好吧，我还想为你做几个积分。我不能像那样反向计算。让我们计算正切的积分。直接这样做就行了。所以正切就是正弦除以余弦。现在有一个思维习惯，我希望你能养成。

Well, there are a couple more integrals that I want to do for you. Where I can’t sort of work backwards like that. Let’s calculate the integral of the tangent. Just do this straight out. So the tangent is the sine divided by the cosine. And now there’s a habit of mind, that I hope you get into.

当你看到余弦并计算这样的积分时，记住余弦的导数是什么很有用。因为它可能出现在积分的其他地方。而这种情况就发生在这里。所以这表明我们做了一个替换。u = cos x。这意味着 du = sin x dx。这是分子，除了减号。

When you see the cosine and you’re calculating an integral like this, it’s useful to remember what the derivative of the cosine is. Because maybe it shows up somewhere else in the integral. And that happens here. So that suggests we make a substitution. u = cos x. Which means du = sin x dx. That’s the numerator, except for the minus sign.

因此，我可以将其重写为，在代换下，我可以将其重写为 du，即分子，sin x dx 是 du，除以 u。好吧，我也知道如何做这个积分。这给了我自然对数，不是吗？所以这是 ln(u) 加一个常数。我还没做完。我必须反向代换并用我编造的这个新变量（称为 u）替换它。

And so I can rewrite this as, under the substitution, I can rewrite this as du, that’s the numerator, sin x dx is du, divided by u. Well, I know how to do that integral too. That gives me the natural log, doesn’t it. So this is ln(u) plus a constant. I’m not quite done. I have to back substitute and replace this new variable that I’ve made up, called u, with what it is.

你得到的是 ln(cos x)。所以正切的积分是减去对数余弦。现在，你可以在书的后面找到这些积分表。诸如此类。我不确定杰里森教授会要求你记忆多少，但微积分确实需要记忆一定数量的知识。这可能是你想知道的事情之一。

And what you get is ln(cos x). So the integral of the tangent is minus log cosine. Now, you find these tables of integrals in the back of the book. Things like that. I’m not sure how much memorization Professor Jerison is going to ask of you, but there is a certain amount of memorization that goes on in calculus. And this is one of the kinds of things that you probably want to know.

让我再做一次积分。我想我正在通过准备好的板子，让我们看看。很好。所以正切的积分是减去对数余弦。我还想知道 x 的正割的积分是多少。我不知道如何直接解决这个问题，但让我告诉你一种思考的方法。

Let me do one more integral. I think I’m making my way through a prepared board here, let’s see. Good. So the integral of the tangent is minus log cosine. I’d also like to know what the integral of the secant of x is. And I don’t know a way to kind of go straight at this, but let me show you a way to think your way through to it.

如果我把这两个事实，正切素数就是它本身，割线素数就是它本身，然后把它们加在一起，我就会得到这个事实。sec x + tan x 的导数是这两个数的总和。割线平方加上割线正切。这两个项中都有一个割线。所以我把它分解出来。这样我就把它放在这儿了。

If I take these two facts, tangent prime is what it is, and secant prime is what it is, and add them together, I get this fact. That the derivative of the sec x + tan x is, well, it’s the sum of these two things. Secant squared plus secant tangent. And there’s a secant that occurs in both of those terms. So I’ll factor it out. And that gives me, I’ll put it over here.

两个项中都有 x 的正割。然后在一个项中，还有另一个正割。而在另一项中，有正切。这很有意思，因为这个等式的两边都出现了同一个项。让我们将 u 写为 sec x + tan x。所以我得到的等式是 u' = u sec x。我刚刚做了一个直接替换。

There’s the secant of x that occurs in both terms. And then in one term, there’s another secant. And in the other term, there’s a tangent. So that’s interesting somehow, because this same term appears on both sides of this equation. Let’s write u, for that sec x + tan x. And so the equation that I get is u’ = u sec x. I’ve just made a direct substitution.

决定将等式两边同时出现的那个东西写成 u。所以 u' 在左边，u * sec x 在右边。好了，这就是我的割线。我试图积分。它告诉你 = u' / u。只要将两边除以 u，我就会得到这个等式。u' / u，它有一个名字。

Just decide that I’m going to write u for that single thing that occurs on both sides of the equation. So u’ is on the left, and u * sec x is on the right. Well, there’s my secant. That I was trying to integrate. And what it tells you is that = u’ / u. Just divide both sides by u, and I get this equation. u’ / u, that has a name.

不确定杰里森教授是否在这堂课上用过这个，但 u' / u，我们确实用过类似的东西。它现在就在黑板上。它是一个对数导数。它是 u 的国家对数的导数。

Not sure that professor Jerison’s used this in this class, but u’ / u, we’ve actually used something like that. It’s on the board right now. It’s a logarithmic derivative. It is the derivative of the national logarithm of u.

也许从右往左读会更容易，如果我想计算对数的导数，那么链式法则说我得到的是 u 的导数乘以对数函数的导数，也就是 1 / u。所以 u' / u 通常被称为对数导数。但它已经达到了我想要的效果。因为它将正割表示为导数。我想我应该把 u 放进去。

Maybe it’s easier to read this from right to left, if I want to calculate the derivative of the logarithm, well, the chain rule says I get the derivative of u times the derivative of the log function, which is 1 / u. So often u’ / u is called the logarithmic derivative. But it’s done what I wanted. Because it’s expressed the secant as a derivative. And I guess I should put in what u is.

它是正割加正切。因此，这意味着积分。对两边求积分。也就是说，sec x dx 的积分是 ln(sec x + tan x)。这就是我创建的这个小备忘录的最后一行。我们现在可以在课堂上使用它。对这个技巧有什么问题吗？

It’s the secant plus the tangent. And so that implies that the integral. Integrate both sides. That says that the integral of sec x dx, is ln(sec x + tan x). So that’s the last line in this little memo that I created. That we can use now for the rest of the class. Any questions about that trick?

三角多项式积分

Integrating trigonometric polynomials

这是个诡计，我没什么可说的了。好的。那么，接下来我要说的是……

It’s a trick, I have nothing more to say about it. OK. So, the next thing I.

哦，是的，现在我想指出的是，使用这些规则和一些思考，你现在可以对大多数三角多项式进行积分。大多数涉及正弦、余弦、正切、正割和其他一切的幂的东西。例如，让我们尝试对 sec^4 x 的积分进行积分。正割函数的大幂。好吧，那里的正割对我来说太多了。所以让我们去掉一些。

Oh yes, so now I want to make the point that using these rules and some thought, you can now integrate most trigonometric polynomials. Most things that involve powers of sines and cosines and tangents and secants and everything else. For example, let’s try to integrate the integral of sec^4 x. Big power of the secant function. Well, there are too many secants there for me. So let’s take some away.

我可以用三角恒等式 sec^2 = 1 + tan^2 把它们去掉。所以我要用 1 + tan^2 替换其中两个正割。这样就剩下两个了。现在我的疯狂有了方法。因为我还剩下一个正割平方。而正割平方是正切的导数。所以这表明可以代换。

And I can take them away by using that trig identity, sec^2 = 1 + tan^2. So I’m going to replace two of those secants by 1 + tan^2. That leaves me with two left over. Now there was method to my madness. Because I’ve got a secant squared left over there. And secant squared is the derivative of tangent. So that suggests a substitution.

也就是说，假设 u = tan x，这样 du = sec^2 x dx。我的积分中出现的两个项都恰好位于此处。因此，这是进行这种替换并将此处的正割平方视为此处微分的一部分的可能性。

Namely, let’s say, let’s let u = tan x, so that du = sec^2 x dx. And I have both terms that occur in my integral sitting there very nicely. So this is the possibility of making this substitution and seeing a secant squared up here as part of the differential here.

这就是为什么我取两个正割并将它们写成 1 + tan^2 是个好主意。现在我可以继续了。在那个替换下，我得到了 1。哦，是的，我应该补充另一个事实。嗯，我想很明显正切平方是 u^2。所以我得到 1 + u^2。然后是 du。sec^2 sec^2 x dx，即 du。嗯，这很容易积分。

That’s why it was a good idea for me to take two of the secants and write them as 1 + tan^2. So now I can continue this. Under that substitution, I get 1. Oh yeah, and I should add the other fact, that. Well I guess it’s obvious that tangent squared is u^2. So I get 1 + u^2. And then du. sec^2 sec^2 x dx, that is du. Well that’s pretty easy to integrate.

所以我得到了 u + u^3 / 3。加上一个常数。然后我只需要反向代入。用原始变量的形式把事情放回去。这给了我 tan x 加正切立方除以 3。这就是答案。所以我们可以花更多的时间来做更多这种多项式三角学的例子。你最好自己做一些练习。

So I get u + u^3 / 3. Plus a constant. And then I just have to back substitute. Put things back in terms of the original variables. And that gives me tan x plus tangent cubed over 3. And there’s the answer. So we could spend a lot more time doing more examples of this kind of polynomial trig thing. It’s probably best for you to do some practice on your own.

因为我还想谈谈其他事情。我想谈谈这些三角恒等式在进行真正的三角代换积分中的应用。所以我们昨天做了一点，今天我会向你们展示更多的例子。让我们先从一个相当难的例子开始。

Because I want to talk about other things, also. And what I want to talk about is the use of these trig identities in making really trig substitution integration. So we did a little bit of this yesterday, and I’ll show you some more examples today. Let’s start with a pretty hard example right off the bat.

因此，这将是 dx 除以 x^2 的积分乘以 1+x^2 的平方根。这是一个看起来很糟糕的积分。那么我们该如何处理呢？嗯，我认为平方根是积分中最丑陋的部分。我们应该尝试以更好的方式写出这个平方根。也就是说，想办法将 1+x^2 写成平方。这样就可以去掉平方根了。

So this is going to be the integral of dx over x^2 times the square root of 1+x^2. It’s a pretty bad looking integral. So how can we approach this? Well, the square root is the ugliest part of the integral, I think. What we should try to do is write this square root in some nicer way. That is, figure out a way to write 1+x^2 as a square. That’ll get rid of the square root.

所以有一个例子，说明如何以不同的方式写出 1 加某个数的平方。它就在那里。sec^2 = 1 + tan^2。所以我想使用这个想法。当我看到这个形式时，这表明我们进行三角代换，并将 x 写为某个新变量的正切。你也可以称之为 theta，因为它就像一个角度。那么 1+x^2 就是正割平方。

So there is an example of a way to write 1 plus something squared in a different way. And it’s right up there. sec^2 = 1 + tan^2. So I want to use that idea. And when I see this form, that suggests that we make a trig substitution and write x as the tangent of some new variable. Which you might as well call theta, to because it’s like an angle. Then 1+x^2 is the secant squared.

根据那个三角恒等式。所以 1+x^2 的平方根是 sec(theta)。对吧？所以这个恒等式就是代换能帮助我们的原因。因为它去掉了平方根，并用其他三角函数代替了它。我最好也能去掉 dx。这是代换过程的一部分。但我们可以做到这一点，因为我知道正切的导数是什么。

According to that trig identity. And so the square root of 1+x^2 is sec(theta). Right? So this identity is the reason that the substitution is going to help us. Because it gets rid of the square root and replaces it by some other trig function. I’d better be able to get rid of the dx, too. That’s part of the substitution process. But we can do that, because I know what the derivative of the tangent is.

它是平方正割。所以 dx / d theta 是 sec^2(theta)。所以 dx 是 sec^2(theta) d theta。所以我们把所有这些东西代入，用我们的新变量 theta 重写整个积分。所以 dx 是分子。那是 sec^2(theta) d theta。然后分母，嗯，它有一个 x^2。那是 tan^2(theta)。然后是这个平方根。我们知道它以 theta 的形式是什么。它是 sec(theta)。好的，现在。

It’s secant squared. So dx / d theta is sec^2(theta). So dx is sec^2(theta) d theta. So let’s just substitute all of that stuff in, and rewrite the entire integral in terms of our new variable, theta. So dx is in the numerator. That’s sec^2(theta) d theta. And then the denominator, well, it has an x^2. That’s tan^2(theta). And then there’s this square root. And we know what that is in terms of theta. It’s sec(theta). OK, now.

我们已经完成了三角代换。我去掉了平方根，我得到了新变量的三角函数。相当复杂的三角函数。这种情况经常发生，你最终会得到分子和分母等各个方面完全不同的三角函数。这里要做的一个系统性的事情是将所有内容都转换为正弦和余弦。

We’ve done the trig substitution. I’ve gotten rid of the square root, I’ve got everything in terms of trig functions of the new variable. Pretty complicated trig function. This often happens, you wind up with a complete scattering of different trig functions in the numerator and denominator and everything. A systematic thing to do here is to put everything in terms of sines and cosines.

除非你能马上看出如何简化，否则系统的做法是用正弦和余弦来重写。那就让我们这样做吧。让我们看看。正割平方，正割是 1 除以余弦。所以我要把余弦平方放在分母上。哦，我想我能做的第一件事就是取消。那就这样做吧。这很聪明。你们也都这么想。取消那些。

Unless you can see right away, how it’s going to simplify, the systematic thing to do is to rewrite in terms of sines and cosines. So let’s do that. So let’s see. The secant squared, secant is 1 over cosine. So I’m going to put a cosine squared in the denominator. Oh, I guess the first thing I can do is cancel. Let’s do that. That’s clever. You were all thinking that too. Cancel those.

所以现在我只需要从分子中的正割得到一个余弦分母。这仍然相当复杂，正割除以正切平方，谁知道呢。好吧，我们会找到答案的。因为正切是正弦除以余弦。所以我应该在正切的位置放一个正弦平方，在那里放一个余弦平方。我仍然有 d theta。现在你看到发生了更多的抵消。这就是以这种方式写出事物的优点。

So now I just get one cosine denominator from the secant there in the numerator. It’s still pretty complicated, secant over tangent squared, who knows. Well, we’ll find out. Because the tangent is sine over cosine. So I should put a sine squared where the tangent was, and a cosine squared up there. And I still have d theta. And now you see some more cancellation occurs. That’s the virtue of writing things out in this way.

所以现在，这里的平方和这个余弦相消。剩下的就是 cos(theta) d theta / sin^2(theta)。这稍微简单一点。这让我能够使用我刚才使用过的相同想法。我在这里看到了正弦。我可能会在这个积分中四处看看它的导数是否出现在任何地方。正弦的微分就是余弦。所以我非常倾向于再做一次替换。

So now, the square here cancels with this cosine. And I’m left with cos(theta) d theta / sin^2(theta). That’s a little simpler. And it puts me in a position to use the same idea I just used. I see the sine here. I might look around in this integral to see if its derivative occurs anywhere. The differential of the sine is the cosine. And so I’m very much inclined to make another substitution.

假设 u，这次直接代换。假设 u 是 theta 的余弦。因为那么 du。哦，对不起。假设 u 是 theta 的正弦。因为那么 du 是 cos(theta) d theta。然后这个积分就变成，嗯，分子就是 du。分母是 u^2。我想我们可以开香槟庆祝，因为我们可以对它求积分。最后去掉积分符号。是的，先生。

Say, u, direct substitution this time. And say u is the cosine of theta. Because then du. Oh, I’m sorry. Say, u is the sine of theta. Because then du is cos(theta) d theta. And then this integral becomes, well, the numerator just is du. The denominator is u^2. And I think we can break out the champagne, because we can integrate that one. Finally get rid of the integral sign. Yes sir.

学生：教授：好的，我怎么知道要让 u 等于正弦而不是余弦呢？因为我想看到 du 出现在这里。如果我在这里有一个正弦，那对我来说就是一个信号，也许我应该说让 u 成为余弦。好吗？另外，因为分母中的这个东西是我想要去掉的。它在分母里。

STUDENT: PROFESSOR: OK, how do I know to make u equal to sine rather than cosine. Because I want to see du appear up here. If I’d had a sine up here, that would be a signal to me that maybe I should say let u be the cosine. OK? Also, because this thing in the denominator is something I want to get rid of. It’s in the denominator.

所以我会一厢情愿地把它去掉，然后给它取个别的名字。在这种情况下，这种方法很管用。一厢情愿并不总是那么管用。所以我对 u^( 2) du 进行积分，得到。1/u 加上一个常数，我完成了这个问题的微积分部分。我现在已经完成了积分。去掉了积分符号。

So I’ll get rid of it by wishful thinking and just call it something else. It works pretty well in this case. Wishful thinking doesn’t always work so well. So I integrate u^( 2) du, and I get. 1/u plus a constant, and I’m done with the calculus part of this problem. I’ve done the integral now. Gotten rid of the integral sign.

但我还没有完全解决这个问题，因为我必须通过两次代换来解决问题。首先是这个。然后是这个。所以这个第一次代换并不难去掉、撤销、反向代换。因为 u 就是 sin(theta)。所以 1/u 是，我猜一个奇特的写法是 theta 的余割。1 除以正弦就是余割。所以我得到了 csc(theta) 加上一个常数。

But I’m not quite done with the problem yet, because I have to work my way back through two substitutions. First, this one. And then this one. So this first substitution isn’t so bad to get rid of, to undo, to back substitute. Because u is just sin(theta). And so 1/u is, I guess a fancy way to write it is the cosecant of theta. 1 over the sine is the cosecant. So I get csc(theta) plus a constant.

后面还有问题吗？是的，先生？学生：教授：对不起，我的听力很差。学生：教授：我一开始怎么知道这个代换的？是因为 1 + x^2。我想利用左上角的三角恒等式。几分钟后我会给你做一个表格，把这一切放在更大的背景下。我想这会对你有帮助。

Is there a question in the back? Yes sir? STUDENT: PROFESSOR: I’m sorry, my hearing is so bad. STUDENT: PROFESSOR: How did I know this substitution in the first place. It’s because of the 1 + x^2. And I want to make use of the trig identity in the upper left hand corner. I’ll make you a table in a few minutes that will put all this in a bigger context. And I think it’ll help you then.

好的，我保证。那么，我现在想尝试讨论的是如何重写这样的术语。

OK, I’ll promise. So, what I want to try to talk about right now is how to rewrite a term like this.

重写三角函数术语

Rewriting trigonometric terms

像这样的三角代换，以 x 的形式返回。所以我想撤消这个技巧代换。这是一个三角代换。我现在要做的是尝试撤消该三角代换。我将向你们展示撤消三角代换的一般方法。这种情况经常发生。

A trig term like this, back in terms of x. So I want to undo this trick substitution. This is a trig sub. And what I want to do now is try to undo that trig sub. And I’ll show you a general method for undoing trig substitutions. This happens quite often.

我不知道 θ 的余割是多少。但我知道 θ 的正切是多少。所以我想建立它们之间的关系。好的，那么撤销。三角函数替换。让我们回到三角学的起源，这个直角三角形。角上的 θ，然后是这三条边。这条边叫做斜边。这条边叫做邻边，那条边叫做对边。

I don’t know what the cosecant of theta is. But I do know what the tangent of theta is. So I want to make a relation between them. OK, so undoing. Trig subs. So let’s go back to where trigonometry always comes from, this right angled triangle. The theta in the corner, and then these three sides. This one’s called the hypotenuse. This one is called the adjacent side, and that one’s called the opposite side.

现在，让我们找出 x 在这个三角形中的位置。让我们试着用 x 来表示这个三角形的边。我知道的是，x 是 theta 的正切。所以 theta 的正切，这个角的正切，是对角除以邻角。你学过 SOH CAH TOA 了吗？好的，所以是对角除以邻角。就是正切。

And now, let’s find out where x lies in this triangle. Let’s try to write the sides of this triangle in terms of x. And what I know is, x is the tangent of theta. So the tangent of theta, tangent of this angle, is opposite divided by adjacent. Did you learn SOH CAH TOA? OK, so it’s opposite divided by adjacent. Is the tangent.

因此，有很多不同的方法可以做到这一点，但为什么不以最简单的方式做到这一点，假设邻边为 1，对边为 x。现在这是正确的，不是吗？我通过说它们的长度为 1 和 x 来获得 theta 正切的正确值。这意味着斜边的长度为 1 + x^2。好吧，这是一个三角形。

So there are different ways to do that, but why not just do it in the simplest way and suppose that the adjacent is 1, and the opposite is x. This is correct now, isn’t it? I get the correct value for the tangent of theta by saying that the lengths of those are 1 and x. And that means that the hypotenuse has length 1 + x^2. Well, here’s a triangle.

我对计算西塔的余割很感兴趣。它在三角形的什么位置？好吧，让我们看看。西塔的余割是 1 除以正弦。而正弦是对边除以斜边。所以余割是斜边除以对边。而斜边是 1 + x^2 的平方根，对边是 x。所以我做到了。我撤销了三角代换。我已经算出这个西塔的余割在 x 方面的值了。

I’m interested in computing the cosecant of theta. Where’s that appear in the triangle? Well, let’s see. The cosecant of theta is 1 over the sine. And the sine is opposite over hypotenuse. So the cosecant is hypotenuse over opposite. And the hypotenuse is the square root of 1 + x^2, and the opposite is x. And so I’ve done it. I’ve undone the trig substitution. I’ve figured out what this cosecant of theta is, in terms of x.

所以最终答案是减去 1+x^2 的平方根，除以 x，再加上一个常数，这就是原始问题的答案。这花了两块木板才讲完。我说明了几个问题。实际上，这三块半木板。我说明了三角代换的这种用法，我稍后会再讲。我说明了耐心。

And so the final answer is minus the square root of 1+x^2, over x, plus a constant, and there’s an answer to the original problem. This took two boards to go through this. I illustrated several things. Actually, this three half boards. I illustrated this use of trig substitution, and I’ll come back to that in a second. I illustrated patience.

我举例说明了如何用正弦和余弦重写事物，然后进行直接替换来计算这样的积分。然后撤消所有这些替换。最后撤消三角替换。那么让我们在这里玩个游戏吧。我们为什么不玩你给我的游戏呢。所以，这里有一个我应该做的步骤。我应该说这是 cos(arctan(theta)) 加一个常数。

I illustrated rewriting things in terms of sines and cosines, and then making a direct substitution to evaluate an integral like this. And then there’s this undoing all of those substitutions. And it culminated with undoing the trig sub. So let’s play a game here. Why don’t we play the game where you give me. So, there’s a step in here that I should have done. I should’ve said this is cos(arctan(theta)) plus a constant.

你能做的最直接的事情就是说，因为 x 是 theta 的正切，这意味着。抱歉，如果 x，这意味着 theta 是 x 的反正切。所以我们把 theta 作为 x 的反正切，这就是你得到的结果。所以实际上，我刚才为你做的是向你展示一种计算某个三角函数应用于另一个三角函数的逆的方法。

The most straightforward thing you can do is to say since x is the tangent of theta, that means that. sorry, if x, that means that theta is the arctangent of x. And so let’s just put in theta as the arctangent of x, and that’s what you get. So really, what I just did for you was to show you a way to compute some trig function applied to the inverse of another trig function.

我用这个技巧计算了反正切的余割。现在，我们来玩个游戏，你给我一个三角函数和一个反三角函数，我试着计算它们的合数。

I computed cosecant of the arctangent by this trick. So now, let’s play the game where you give me a trig function and an inverse trig function, and I try to compute what the composite is.

玩游戏

Playing the game

好的。谁能给我一个三角函数。必须是这些标准函数之一。学生：正切。教授：正切。好吧。再来一个怎么样？学生：正弦。教授：正弦。我们对正弦有共识吗？学生：教授：正割？

OK. So who can give me a trig function. Has to be one of these standard ones. STUDENT: Tan. PROFESSOR: Tangent. Alright. How about another one? STUDENT: Sine. PROFESSOR: Sine. Do we have agreement on sine. STUDENT: PROFESSOR: Secant?

学生：教授：对，csc 的欢呼声最高。这就是游戏。我们必须计算，尝试计算那个合成。这有什么问题吗？学生：教授：可接受是什么意思？你不这么认为吗？所以问题是，这难道不是一个完全可以接受的最终答案吗？这是一个正确的最终答案。但这更有见地。

STUDENT: PROFESSOR: Right, csc has the best cheer. So that’s the game. We have to compute, try to compute, that composite. Something wrong with this? STUDENT: PROFESSOR: What does acceptable mean? Don’t you think. so the question is, isn’t this a perfectly acceptable final answer. It’s a correct final answer. But this is much more insightful.

毕竟，原始问题涉及平方根和其他问题，这就是您可能希望得到的答案。这肯定是一个更好的答案。当您继续将该答案用于其他事情时，它可能会对您更有用。好的，让我们尝试这样做。撤消涉及余割的三角代换。

And after all the original thing was involving square roots and things, this is the kind of thing you might hope for is an answer. This is just a nicer answer for sure. And likely to be more useful to you when you go on and use that answer for something else. OK, so let’s try to do this. Undo a trig substitution that involved a cosecant.

我四处摸索，发现自己在试图找出 theta 的正切值。我们是这样操作的。我画出这个三角形。Theta 是这里的角度。这是邻边，对边，斜边。所以，第一件事就是我如何让余割出现在这里，csc x。

And I manipulate around, and I find myself trying to find out what’s the tangent of theta. So here’s how we go about it. I draw this triangle. Theta is the angle here. This is the adjacent, opposite, hypotenuse. So, the first thing is how can I make the cosecant appear here, csc x.

我应该给边取什么尺寸才能得到 x 的余割，抱歉，为了让 theta 成为 x 的余割。这个东西就是 theta。所以，这意味着 x 的余割。这意味着 theta 的余割应该是 x。Theta 是反余割，所以 x 是 theta 的余割。那么，我要取边为多少才能得到余割呢？余割是 1 除以正弦。

What dimensions should I give to the sides in order for the cosecant of x, sorry, in order for theta to be the cosecant of x. This thing is theta. So, that means that the cosecant of x. that means the cosecant of theta should be x. Theta is the arccosecant, so x is the cosecant of theta. So, what’ll I take the sides to be, to get the cosecant? The cosecant is 1 over the sine.

正弦是斜边除以对边。所以我得到了斜边除以对边。这应该是 x。所以我可以将对边设为任何我想要的值，但最简单的方法是将其设为 1。我们这样做。那么这对其他边意味着什么？斜边最好是 x。然后我恢复了这一点。所以这是一个显示正确角度的三角形。

And the sine is the opposite over the hypotenuse. So I get hypotenuse over opposite. And that’s supposed to be what x is. So I could make the opposite anything I want, but the simplest thing is to make it 1. Let’s do that. And then what does that mean about the rest of the sides? Hypotenuse had better be x. And then I’ve recovered this. So here’s a triangle that exhibits the correct angle.

剩下的这个边对我们很有用。它是 x^2 1 的平方根。所以我得到了一个具有正确角度 theta 的三角形，现在我想计算该角度的正切。嗯，这很简单。即对角除以邻角。所以我得到了 1 除以 x^2 1 的平方根。非常灵活的工具，在很多不同的时候对你都很有用。

This remaining side is going to be useful to us. And it is the square root of x^2 1. So I’ve got a triangle of the correct angle theta, and now I want to compute the tangent of that angle. Well, that’s easy. That’s opposite divided by adjacent. So I get 1 over the square root of x^2 1. Very flexible tool that’ll be useful to you in many different times.

当你需要撤消三角替换时，这很可能很有用。

Whenever you have to undo a trig substitution, this is likely to be useful.

三角代换总结

Summary of trig substitutions

好的，这是一场精彩的比赛。这场比赛中没有赢家。我们都是赢家。没有输家，我们都是赢家。好的。那么，很好。那么让我制作一张表格，列出不同的三角代换，以及它们如何有用。三角代换总结。所以在这里，我们有，如果你看到了，所以如果你的被积函数包含，做一个代换得到。

OK, that was a good game. No winners in this game. We’re all winners. No losers, we’re all winners. OK. So, good. So let me make this table of the different trig substitutions, and how they can be useful. Summary of trig substitutions. So over here, we have, if you see, so if your integrand contains, make a substitution to get.

因此，如果你的被积函数包含，我会把这些东西写成平方根。如果它包含平方根 a^2 x^2，这就是我们周四讨论的内容。当我试图找到圆的那部分面积时。在那里，我建议我们应该进行替换 x = a cos(theta)。或者，x = a sin(theta)。任何一个都一样好。而且没有办法选择其中一个而不是另一个。

So if your integrand contains, I’ll write these things out as square roots. If it contains the square root a^2 x^2, this is what we talked about on Thursday. When I was trying to find the area of that piece of a circle. There, I suggested that we should make the substitution x = a cos(theta). Or, x = a sin(theta). Either one works just as well. And there’s no way to prefer one over the other.

当你进行替换时，x = a cos(theta)，你会得到 a^2 a^2 cos^2(theta)。theta。1 cos^2 是 sin^2。所以你得到了一个 sin(theta)。所以这个表达式在替换后等于这个表达式。然后你继续。然后你就去掉了平方根，你就得到了一个你必须尝试做的三角积分。如果你替换了 sin(theta)，你会得到 a^2 a^2 sin^2，也就是 cos(theta)。

And when you make the substitution, x = a cos(theta), you get a^2 a^2 cos^2(theta). theta. 1 cos^2 is sin^2. So you get a sin(theta). So this expression becomes equal to this expression under that substitution. And then you go on. Then you’ve gotten rid of the square root, and you’ve got a trigonometric integral that you have to try to do. If you made the substitution a sin(theta), you’d get a^2 a^2 sin^2, which is a cos(theta).

然后你也可以继续。我们刚刚看到了另一个例子。也就是说，如果你有 a^2 + x^2。这就像我们上面的例子。在这个例子中，a = 1。我们做了什么？我们尝试了替换 x = a tan(theta)。原因是我可以插入左上角的三角恒等式。并用 a sec(theta) 替换 a^2 + x^2。正割平方的平方根。

And then you can go ahead as well. We just saw another example. Namely, if you have a^2 + x^2. That’s like the example we had up here. a = 1 in this example. What did we do? We tried the substitution x = a tan(theta). And the reason is that I can plug into the trig identity up here in the upper left. And replace a^2 + x^2 by a sec(theta). Square root of the secant squared.

这个表中还有一件事。有点像，像这样的项的唯一剩余的总和或差。如果你有 x^2 a^2，就会发生这种情况。所以，我认为我们可以进行替换 a sec(theta)。因为毕竟，sec^2(theta)。所以 x^2 a^2。抱歉。让我们看看当我进行替换时会发生什么。x^2 a^2 = a^2 sec^2(theta) a^2。在这个替换下。这是 sec^2 1。好吧，把 1 放在另一边。你会发现 tan^2 出来了。

There’s one more thing in this table. Sort of, the only remaining sum or difference of terms like this. And that’s what happens if you have x^2 a^2. So there, I think we can make a substitution a sec(theta). Because, after all, sec^2(theta). so x^2 a^2. Sorry. Let’s see what happens when I make that substitution. x^2 a^2 = a^2 sec^2(theta) a^2. Under this substitution. That’s sec^2 1. Well, put the 1 on the other side. And you find tan^2, coming out.

所以这是 a^2 tan^2(theta)。这就是你得到的，a 乘以 tan(theta)。我取平方根后，得到 tan(theta)。所以这些是三种基本的三角代换形式。三角代换对于摆脱这样的表达式并用三角表达式替换它们很有用。

So this is a^2 tan^2(theta). And so that’s what you get, a times tan(theta). After I take the square root, I get a tan(theta). So these are the three basic trig substitution forms. Where trig substitutions are useful to get rid of expressions like this, and replace them by trigonometric expressions.

完成正方形

Completing the square

然后你使用这个技巧，如果可以的话，你进行积分，然后你使用这个技巧在最后摆脱 theta。

And then you use this trick, you do the integral if you can and then you use this trick to get rid of the theta at the end.

现在，今天我要讲的最后一件事是完成平方。之所以要讲这个，是因为不幸的是，并不是每个二次方程的平方根都有这么简单的形式。你经常会遇到不只是简单的东西的平方根。比如这些形式之一。比如里面可能有一个中项。

So now, the last thing I want to talk about today is called completing the square. And that comes in because unfortunately, not every square root of a quadratic has such a simple form. You will often encounter things that are not just the square root of something simple. Like one of these forms. Like there might be a middle term in there.

我实际上没有时间向你们展示一个实际的例子。但这种情况确实经常发生。所以我想向你们展示如何处理类似下面的例子。让我们试着将 dx 积分到 x^2 + 4x 上，也就是 x^2 + 4x 的平方根。所以这是某个平方的平方根，某个二次的平方根。这很像这个生意。

I don’t actually have time to show you an example of how this comes out in a sort of practical example. But it does happen quite frequently. And so I want to show you how to deal with things like the following example. Let’s try to integrate dx over x^2 + 4x, the square root of x^2 + 4x. So there’s a square root of some square, some quadratic. It’s very much like this business.

但它不属于上述任何一种形式。所以我想做的是向你们展示如何用代换法将其重写为上述形式之一。所有这些都是关于代换的。所以游戏是将二次方程重写为 x 加上某个或其他东西。加上其他常数。所以把它写出来，试着把它写成平方加或减另一个常数的形式。然后我们从那里继续。

But it isn’t of any of these forms. And so what I want to do is show you how to rewrite it in one of those forms using substitution, again. All this is about substitution. So the game is to rewrite quadratic as something like x plus something or other. Plus some other constant. So write it, try to write it, in the form of a square plus or minus another constant. And then we’ll go on from there.

那么我们在本例中这样做。x^2，x^2 + 4x。好吧，如果你把这个形式平方，那么中间项将是 2ax。所以，既然我这里有一个中间项，我几乎知道 a 应该是多少。为了得到 x^2 + 4x 这样的结果，唯一的选择就是将 a 取为 2。因为这样，你就会得到这个结果。

So let’s do that in this case. x^2, x^2 + 4x. Well, if you square this form out, then the middle term is going to be 2ax. So that, since I have a middle term here, I pretty much know what a has to be. The only choice in order to get something like x^2 + 4x out of this, is to take a to be 2. Because then, this is what you get.

这还不太正确，但让我们计算一下我这里得到的结果。x^2 + 4x，到目前为止还不错，加上 4，而这里没有加上 4。所以我必须通过减去 4 来解决这个问题。这就是我的意思。我已经完成了平方。用这样的表达式的平方来消除中间项的过程的词。这叫做完成平方。

This isn’t quite right yet, but let’s compute what I have here. x^2 + 4x, so far so good, plus 4, and I don’t have a plus 4 here. So I have to fix that by subtracting 4. So that’s what I mean. I’ve completed the square. The word for this process of eliminating the middle term by using the square of an expression like that. That’s called completing the square.

我们可以使用这个过程来计算这个积分。让我们这样做。所以我可以重写这个积分，像这样重写这个分母。然后我将尝试使用这里的其中一种形式。因此，为了在那里得到一个变量，而不是像 x + 2 这样复杂的变量，我倾向于想出另一个变量名并将其写成相等，将 x + 2 写为另一个变量名。

And we can use that process to compute this integral. So let’s do that. So I can rewrite this integral, rewrite this denominator like this. And then I’m going to try to use one of these forms over here. So in order to get a single variable there, instead of something complicated like x + 2, I’m inclined to come up with another variable name and write it equal, write x + 2 as that other variable name.

这里还有另一个直接代换。u = x + 2。算出 du 是多少。这很简单。然后用这些项重写积分。所以 dx = du。然后在分母中，我有它的平方根。哦，是的，所以我认为作为这项工作的一部分，我会写出 x^2 + 4x 是多少。

So here’s another little direct substitution. u = x + 2. Figure out what du is. That’s pretty easy. And then rewrite the integral in those terms. So dx = du. And then in the denominator I have, well, I have the square root of that. Oh yeah, so I think as part of this I’ll write out what x^2 + 4x is.

重点是，它等于 u^2 4。x^2 + 4x = u^2 4。这是包含替换数据的数据框。现在我可以把它放进去了。我有 x^2 + 4x。就 u 而言，那就是 u^2 4。现在我更开心了，因为我可以在我的表格中查找 u^2 4。它实际上就在这里。

The point is, it’s equal to u^2 4. x^2 + 4x = u^2 4. There’s the data box containing the substitution data. And so now I can put that in. I have x^2 + 4x there. In terms of u, that’s u^2 4. Well, now I’m in a happier position because I can look for u^2 4 for something like that in my table here. And it actually sits down here.

因此，除了在这里使用字母 x 而不是那里的 u 之外。这告诉了我我想要什么。因此，为了处理这个问题，我应该使用三角代换。根据底线，建议的三角代换是 a = 2，所以 a^2 = 4。建议是，我应该取 x。但我最好不要再使用字母 x 了。

So except for the use of the letter x here instead of u over there. That tells me what I want. So to handle this, what I should use is a trig substitution. And the trig substitution that’s suggested is, according to the bottom line with a = 2, so a^2 = 4. The suggestion is, I should take x. But I’d better not use the letter x any more.

但是我没有字母 x，我有字母 u。我应该取 u 等于 2 正割。然后是一些我以前没用过的字母。然后 theta 可用。这是一个查找表的过程。我看到 u^2 4 的平方根，我看到它是这种形式。我被指示进行这种替换。这就是我刚才做的。让我们看看结果如何。这意味着 du 是 2，好的。

But I don’t have a letter x, I have the letter u. I should take u equal to 2 secant. And then some letter I haven’t used before. And theta is available. This is a look up table process. I see the square root of u^2 4, I see that’s of this form. I’m instructed to make this substitution. And that’s what I just did. Let’s see how it works out. So that means the du is 2, OK.

正割的导数是什么？正割就是正切。所以 du = 2 sec(theta) tan(theta)。u^2 4 是，这是结果。我应该能够用正切来重写它。根据这个。u^2 4 是 4 正割平方减 4。正割平方减 1 是正切平方。所以这是 4 tan^2(theta)。对吧？学生：教授：但我把它平方了。现在我要对它求平方根。

What’s the derivative of the secant? Secant tangent. So du = 2 sec(theta) tan(theta). And u^2 4 is, here’s the payoff. I’m supposed to be able to rewrite that in terms of the tangent. According to this. u^2 4 is 4 secant squared minus 4. And secant squared minus 1 is tangent squared. So this is 4 tan^2(theta). Right, yeah? STUDENT: PROFESSOR: But I squared it. And now I’ll square root it.

我会得到 2，这个正切就会消失。这就是我进行这个替换的数据框。让我们转到另一个板。我现在所在的位置是 du 对 u^2 4 平方根的积分。我这里有所有需要的数据，可以用 theta 来重写它。所以 du = 2 sec(theta) tan(theta) d theta。分母是 2 tan(theta)。哈哈。

And I’ll get a 2 and this tangent will go away. So there’s my data box for this substitution. And let’s go on to another board. So where I’m at is the integral of du over the square root of u^2 4. And I have all the data I need here to rewrite that in terms of theta. So du = 2 sec(theta) tan(theta) d theta. And the denominator is 2 tan(theta). Ha.

好吧，这里进行了一些非常好的简化。2 取消了。切线也取消了。剩下的就是尝试计算积分，sec(theta) d theta。幸运的是，在这一个小时的开始，我算出了如何计算 theta 正割的积分。结果就是这样。所以这是 ln(sec(theta) + tan(theta)) 加上一个常数。我们完成了微积分部分。那里没有积分了。

Well, so some very nice simplification happens here. The 2’s cancel. And the tangents cancel. And I’m left with trying to work with the integral, sec(theta) d theta. And luckily enough at the very beginning of the hour, I worked out how to compute the integral of the secant of theta. And there it is. So this is ln(sec(theta) + tan(theta)) plus a constant. And we’re done with the calculus part. There’s no more integral there.

但是我还没有完全解决这个问题，因为我又需要尝试撤销这两个替换。所以让我们逐个撤销它们。让我们看看。我这里有这个三角替换。如果需要，我可以使用我的三角形技巧。但也许我不需要。让我们看看，我知道 θ 的正割关于 u 是多少吗？好吧，我知道。所以我得到了 ln(u/2)。

But I still am not quite done with the problem, because again I have these two substitutions to try to undo. So let’s undo them one by one. Let’s see. I have this trig substitution here. And I could use my triangle trick, if I need to. But maybe I don’t need to. Let’s see, do I know what the secant of theta is in terms of u? Well, I do. So I get ln(u/2).

我知道 u 的正切是多少吗？我知道。它就在这里。所以在这种情况下，我很幸运。我不必再去使用那个三角技巧。所以 theta 的正切是 u^2 4 除以 2 的平方根。很好。所以我撤消了这个三角替换。我还没有完全完成，因为我的答案与 u 有关。我原本想要的是 x。

Do I know what the tangent is in terms of u? Well, I do. It’s here. So I lucked out, in this case. And I don’t have to go through and use that triangle trick. So the tangent of theta is the square root of u^2 4, over 2. Good. So I’ve undone this trig substitution. I’m not quite done yet because my answer is involved with u. And what I wanted originally was x.

但是我开始使用的这种直接替换确实很容易处理。每次看到 u 时，我都可以代入 x + 2。所以这是 (x+2)/2 的自然对数加上平方根。当我在这里用 x + 2 代替 u 时会发生什么？你知道会得到什么。你得到的正是我们开始时得到的。对吧？我在这里用 x + 2 代替 u。

But this direct substitution that I started with is really easy to deal with. I can just put x + 2 every time I see a u. So this is the natural logarithm of (x+2)/2 plus the square root. What’s going to happen when I put x + 2 in place for u here? You know what you get. You get exactly what we started with. Right? I put x + 2 in place of the u here.

我得到了 x^2 + 4x。所以我又回到了纯粹关于 x 的函数。好的，这是一个很好的结束点。祝你度过美好的一天假期。我想这堂课周一不会上。再见。

I get x^2 + 4x. So I’ve gotten back to a function purely in terms of x OK, that’s a good place to quit. Have a great little one day break. I guess this class doesn’t meet on Monday anyway. Bye.

Lec 29 | MIT 18.01 单变量微积分，2007 年秋季

Lec 29 | MIT 18.01 Single Variable Calculus, Fall 2007

15 年前 (2009 年 9 月 10 日) — 48:38 https://youtube.com/watch?v=HgEqXhsIq_g

15 years ago (Sep 10, 2009) — 48:38 https://youtube.com/watch?v=HgEqXhsIq_g

以下内容根据 Creative Commons 许可提供。您的支持将帮助 MIT OpenCourseWare 继续免费提供高质量的教育资源。要捐款或查看数百门 MIT 课程的其他材料，请访问 MIT OpenCourseWare，网址为 ocw.mit.edu。教授：今天我们将继续讨论积分方法。我今天要描述的方法处理以下形式的一整类函数。

The following content is provided under a Creative Commons license. Your support will help MIT OpenCourseWare continue to offer high quality educational resources for free. To make a donation or to view additional materials from hundreds of MIT courses, visit MIT OpenCourseWare at ocw.mit.edu. PROFESSOR: Today we’re going to continue our discussion of methods of integration. The method that I’m going to describe today handles a whole class of functions of the following form.

取 P (x) / Q (x)，这被称为有理函数。这意味着它是两个多项式的比值，这两个多项式分别是函数 P (x) 和 Q (x)。我们将使用一种称为部分分式的方法来处理所有此类函数。这种方法的作用是将 P / Q 拆分成您可以称之为更简单的部分。所以这将是某种代数。

You take P (x) / Q (x) and this is known as a rational function. And all that means is that it’s a ratio off two polynomials, which are these functions P ( x) and Q ( x). We’ll handle all such functions by a method which is known as partial fractions. And what this does is, it splits P / Q into what you could call easier pieces. So that’s going to be some kind of algebra.

这就是我们今天要花大部分时间做的事情。我先举个例子。我所有的例子都将说明更通用的方法。这个例子是求函数 1 / x 1 + 3 / x + 2 dx 的积分。这很容易做到。只是，我们已经知道答案了。它是 ln x 1 + 3 ln x + 3。加上一个常数。这样就完成了。

And that’s what we’re going to spend most of our time doing today. I’ll start with an example. And all of my examples will be illustrating more general methods. The example is to integrate the function 1 / x 1 +, say, 3 / x + 2 dx. That’s easy to do. It’s just, we already know the answer. It’s ln x 1 + 3 ln x + 3. Plus a constant. So that’s done.

现在，困难来了。困难在于我可以从这个函数开始，这个函数完全可以处理。然后我可以将这两个函数相加。就像我加分数一样。这样就得到了一个公分母。这样就得到了 x + 2 + 3 ( x 1 )。

So now, here’s the difficulty that is going to arise. The difficulty is that I can start with this function, which is perfectly manageable. And than I can add these two functions together. The way I add fractions. So that’s getting a common denominator. And so that gives me x + 2 here + 3 ( x 1).

现在，如果我把所有这些项加在一起，那么总共有 4x + 2 3，也就是 1。如果我把分母乘以 x ^2 + 2 变成 3，那就很有趣了。希望不会有太多这样的变换。这里还有另一个吗？学生：教授：哦，它早些时候发生过。哇，那里的振动很有趣。好的。谢谢。所以，我猜我的 3 正在和我的 2 对话。

And now if I combine together all of these terms, then altogether I have 4x + 2 3, that’s 1. And if I multiply out the denominator that’s x ^2 + that 2 turned into a 3, that’s interesting. Hope there aren’t too many more of those transformations. Is there another one here? STUDENT: PROFESSOR: Oh, it happened earlier on. Wow that’s an interesting vibration there. OK. Thank you. So, I guess my 3’s were speaking to my 2’s.

在我过去的某个地方。好吧，无论如何，我认为这现在是正确的。所以问题如下。这就是问题所在。这个积分很简单。我说它很简单，我们已经知道如何做了。在这里。但现在在这里，它被伪装了。它是相同的函数，但不再清楚如何对其进行积分。如果你面对这个问题，你会说我该怎么办。

Somewhere in my past. OK, anyway, I think this is now correct. So the problem is the following. This is the problem with this. This integral was easy. I’m calling it easy, we already know how to do it. Over here. But now over here, it’s disguised. It’s the same function, but it’s no longer clear how to integrate it. If you’re faced with this one, you say what am I supposed to do.

我们必须解决这个难题。所以我们要做的就是揭开这个伪装。所以我们有代数问题。哦，哇。水里一定有什么东西。令人印象深刻。哇。好吧，让我们看看。2/3 = 3/2 吗？天哪。那太好了。好吧，今天我会用这里的其他几个换位让你保持清醒。所以我们的代数问题是检测里面的简单部分。

And we have to get around that difficulty. And so what we’re going to do is we’re going to unwind this disguise. So we have the algebra problem that we have. Oh, wow. There must be something in the water. Impressive. Wow. OK, let’s see. Is 2/3 = 3/2? Holy cow. Well that’s good. Well, I’ll keep you awake today with several other transpositions here. So our algebra problem is to detect the easy pieces which are inside.

我们将要使用的方法，无论如何我们要强调的方法，是一种代数技巧，是一种捷径，称为掩盖方法。但我们将讨论比这更普遍的事情。但无论如何，这就是我们要讲的内容。是一种称为掩盖方法的东西。好的。这就是我们的介绍。我只需要记住 2 不等于 3。我会继续重复这一点。

And the method that we’re going to use, the one that we’ll emphasize anyway, is one algebraic trick which is a shortcut, which is called the cover up method. But we’re going to talk about even more general things than that. But anyway, this is where we’re headed. Is something called the cover up method. Alright. So that’s our intro. And I’ll just have to remember that 2 is not 3. I’ll keep on repeating that.

现在我要向你们描述如何揭开这个伪装。第一步是，我们写下我们想要积分的函数。就是这个。现在我们必须消除我们造成的第一个损害。所以第一步是分解分母。而这些分解，我们恰好知道分解的因数，所以我就不做这个了。但这可能是一个相当困难的步骤。

So now here I’m going to describe to you how we unwind this disguise. The first step is, we write down the function we want to integrate. Which was this. And now we have to undo the first damage that we did. So the first step is to factor the denominator. And that factors, we happen to know the factors, so I’m not going to carry this out. But this can be a rather difficult step.

但为了便于说明，我们假设它已经完成了。所以我将分母因式分解。现在，我要做的第二件事就是我称之为设置的事情。我将如何设置。稍后我将更系统地告诉您这些事情是什么。设置是我想以某种方式检测我之前所做的事情。

But we’re going to assume that it’s done. For the purposes of illustration here. So I factor the denominator. And now, the second thing that I’m going to do is what I’m going to call the setup here. How I’m going to set things up. And I’ll tell you what these things are more systematically in a second. And the setup is that I want to somehow detect what I did before.

我要在这里写一些未知数。我期望这会分成两部分。一部分分母为 x 1，另一部分分母为 x + 2。所以现在，我的第三步是解出 A 和 B。如果我这样做了，我就完成了。这就是彻底揭穿这个伪装。这就是掩盖方法派上用场的地方。

And I’m going to write some unknowns here. What I expect is that this will break up into two pieces. One with the denominator x 1, and the other with the denominator x + 2. So now, my third step is going to be to solve for A and B. And then I’m done, if I do that. That’s the complete unwinding of this disguise. And this is where the cover up method comes in handy.

这就是我将要描述的方法。现在，你可以用笨拙的方式做代数运算，也可以用快速的方式做。我们希望高效地完成所涉及的代数运算。所以让我向你展示这个技巧的第一步是什么。我们将通过乘以 (x 1) 来求解 A。现在，请注意，如果你在方程 2 中乘以 (x 1)，你得到的是这个。

This is this method that I’m about to describe. Now, you can do the algebra in a clumsy way, or you can do it in a quick way. And we’d like to get efficient about the algebra involved. And so let me show you what the first step in the trick is. We’re going to solve for A by multiplying by (x 1). Now, notice if you multiply by (x 1) in that equation 2, what you get is this.

你得到 4x 2 / x 1 相消。你在左边得到这个。在右边你得到 A。x 1 再次相消。然后我们得到这个额外的项。即 B/ ( x + 2)( x 1)。现在，这里的技巧，我们马上就会得到更好的技巧。这里的技巧是我没有尝试完全清除分母。

You got 4x 2 / the x 1’s cancel. You get this on the left hand side. And on the right hand side you get A. The x 1’s cancel again. And then we get this extra term. Which is B/ ( x + 2)( x 1). Now, the trick here, and we’re going to get even better trick in just a second. The trick here is that I didn’t try to clear the denominators completely.

我做这件事的方式非常高效。它只清除了一个因子。这里的结果非常有用。也就是说，如果我现在代入 x = 1，这个项也会消失。所以我现在要做的是代入 x = 1。我在左边得到的是 4 1 和 1 + 2，在左边我得到 A。就这样。

I was very efficient about the way I did it. It just cleared one factor. And the result here is very useful. Namely, if I plug in now x = 1, this term drops out too. So what I’m going to do now is I’m going to plug in x = 1. And what I get on the left hand side here is 4 1 and 1 + 2, and on the left hand side I get A. That’s the end.

这是我的 A 公式。A 恰好等于 1。当然，这也是我所期望的。A 最好是 1，因为这个公式分解为 1 / x 1 + 3 / x + 2。所以这是正确答案。这里有一个问题，我没答对。学生：多项式不是定义为具有整数幂的函数吗？或者它们可以是平方根？

This is my formula for A. A happens to be equal to 1. And that’s, of course, what I expect. A had better be 1, because the thing broke up into 1 / x 1 + 3 / x + 2. So this is the correct answer. There was a question out here, which I missed. STUDENT: Aren’t polynomials defined as functions with whole powers, or could they be square roots?

教授：多项式是否定义为具有整数幂的函数，或者它们可以是平方根？这就是问题所在。答案是，它们只有整数幂。例如，这里我只有幂 1 和 0。这里分母中有幂 2、1 和 0。平方根不适用于这种方法。另一个问题。学生：教授：为什么我说 x = 1？

PROFESSOR: Are polynomials defined as functions with whole powers, or can they be square roots? That’s the question. The answer is, they only have whole powers. So for instance here I only have the power 1 and 0. Here I have the powers 2,1 and 0 in the denominator. Square roots are no good for this method. Another question. STUDENT: PROFESSOR: Why did I say x = 1?

我之所以说 x = 1，是因为它计算速度非常快。你无法提前知道这一点，这是方法的一部分。事实证明这是最好的办法。这是得到系数 A 的最快方法。现在说说奇怪的事情，让我在开始之前先暂停一下。如果我将 x = 1 代入原始方程，我得到的将是无意义的结果。

The reason why I said x = 1 was that it works really fast. You can’t know this in advance, that’s part of the method. It just turns out to be the best thing to do. The fastest way of getting at the coefficient A. Now the curious thing, let me just pause for a second before I do it. If I had plugged x = 1 into the original equation, I would have gotten nonsense.

因为分母会变成 0。这似乎是最糟糕的做法。最糟糕的做法是设置 x = 1。另一方面，我们做的是一个诡计。我们乘以 x 1。这样等式就变成了这样。所以现在，我变相地乘以了 0。但结果却是合法的。

Because I would’ve gotten 0 in the denominator. And that seems like the most horrible thing to do. The worst possible thing to do, is to set x = 1. On the other hand, what we did is a trick. We multiplied by x 1. And that turned the equation into this. So now, in disguise, I multiplied by 0. But that turns out to be legitimate.

因为这个方程对于除 1 之外的所有 x 都成立。然后，我可以将 x 趋向于 1，而不是取 x = 1。这才是我真正需要的。极限是 x 趋向于 1。那么这个方程仍然有效。所以我使用的是最坏的情况，也就是看起来像是除以 0 的情况。这对我很有帮助，因为它抵消了 B 方面的所有信息。

Because really this equation is true for all x except 1. And then instead of taking x = 1, I can really take x tends to 1. That’s really what I need. The limit is x goes to one. The equation is still valid then. So I’m using the worst case, the case that looks like it’s dividing by 0. And it’s helping me because it’s cancelling out all the information in terms of B.

因此，这里的优势在于这一部分发生的抵消。这就是方法。我们将在一秒钟内将其大大缩短。但让我也对另一个系数进行计算。因此，我要解出 B 的另一个系数，我要乘以 x + 2。当我这样做时，我得到 4x 1 / x 1，这是左边，最上面的表达式。

So the advantage here is this cancellation that occurs in this part. So that’s the method. We’re going to shorten it much, much more in a second. But let me carry it out for the other coefficient as well. So the other coefficient I’m going to solve for B, I’m going to multiply by x + 2. And when I do that, I get 4x 1 / x 1, that’s the left hand side, the very top expression there.

然后在下面我得到 A/ ( x 1)( x + 2)。然后 x + 2 再次被抵消。所以我得到 B 单独存在。现在我要使用同样的技巧。我要设置 x = 2。这就是要消除此处 A 项的值。这样就完全抵消了该项。我们在这里得到的结果是 8 1 / 2 1 = B。

And then down below I get A/ ( x 1)( x + 2). And then again the x + 2’s cancel. So I get B sitting alone. And now I’m going to do the same trick. I’m going to set x = 2. That’s the value which is going to knock out this A term here. So that cancels this term completely. And what we get here all told is 8 1 / 2 1 = B.

换句话说，B = 3，这也是它应该有的值。B 就是这个数字 3，就在这里。我现在不会把它改成 2。因为我知道它不是 2。有一个问题。学生：教授：好的。现在，这就是所谓的掩盖。但实际上它执行的速度要比这快得多。

In other words, B = 3, which was also what it was supposed to be. B was this number 3, right here. Which I’m now not going to change to 2. Because I know that it’s not 2. There was a question. STUDENT: PROFESSOR: All right. Now, this is the method which is called cover up. But it’s really carried out much, much faster than this.

我将回顾一下这个方法，并向你们展示它的基本内容。第一步是分解分母 Q。这就是我在上面标记为 1 的东西。这是上面分母的分解。第二步是我称之为设置的步骤。这是第 2 步。在这里我提前知道了我的目标。

So I’m going to review the method and I’m going to show you what it is in general. So the first step is to factor the denominator, Q. That’s what I labeled 1 over there. That was the factorization of the denominator up top. The second step is what I’m going to call the setup. That’s step 2. And that’s where I knew what I was aiming for in advance.

我必须在每个例子中都向你解释这个设置应该是什么。也就是说，未知数应该是什么，以及我们追求的目标，即简化表达式。这就是设置。然后第三步就是我现在所说的掩饰。这只是我在上一块板上所做的一种非常快速的方法，即求解未知系数。

And I’m going to have to explain to you in every instance exactly what this setup should be. That is, what the unknowns should be and what target, simplified expression, we’re aiming for. So that’s the setup. And then the third step is what I’ll now call cover up. Which is just a very fast way of doing what I did on this last board, which is solving for the unknown coefficients.

现在，让我再为您执行一遍。在这里。所以它是 4x 1 除以，所以这是为了消除这里的书写。手写会使它更快。所以这部分只是分解分母，即 1，这是第 1 步。然后第 2 步，再次是设置，设置如下。好的，这就是设置。

So now, let me perform it for you again. Over here. So it’s 4x 1 divided by, so this is to eliminate writing here. Handwriting it makes it much faster. So this part just factoring the denominator, that was 1, that was step 1. And then step 2, again, is the setup, which is setting it up like this. Alright, that’s the setup.

现在我声称，不用写太多，我就能弄清楚 A 和 B 是什么。只要盯着这个看。所以现在我要做的就是想想我刚才做了什么。我要直接去做。所以让我以视觉的方式向你展示该方法的组成。我要掩盖，也就是说，剔除这个因素，并专注于这里的这个数字。

And now I claim that without writing very much, I can figure out what A and B are. Just by staring at this. So now what I’m going to do is I’m just going to think what I did over there. And I’m just going to do it directly. So let me show you what the method consists of visually. I’m going to cover up, that is, knock out this factor, and focus on this number here.

我要代入使 0 成立的那个东西，也就是 x = 1。所以我把 x = 1 代入到左边。我得到的结果是 4 1 / 1 + 2 = A。现在，这与我之前做的一样。我只是跳过了中间的代数步骤，这需要大量的写作。所以掩盖方法实际上相当于以下事情。

And I’m going to plug in the thing that makes the 0, which is x = 1. So I’m plugging in x = 1. To this left hand side. And what I get is 4 1 / 1 + 2 = A. Now, that’s the same thing I did over there. I just did it by skipping the intermediate algebra step, which is a lot of writing. So the cover up method really amounts to the following thing.

我打算在这里乘以这个。这样就取消了这个，其他的都去掉了。这样就只剩下右边的 A。而我必须在这边把它去掉。换句话说，通过消除这个，我就把右边的 a 隔离了。所以掩饰就是我把这个覆盖了，然后把 A 去掉了。同样，我可以对 B 做同样的事情。

I’m thinking of multiplying this over here. It cancels this and it gets rid of everything else. And it just leaves me with A on the right hand side. And I have to get rid of it on this side. So in other words, by eliminating this, I’m isolating a on the right hand side. So the cover up is that I’m covering this and getting A out of it. Similarly, I can do the same thing with B.

它关注的是 x = 2 这个值。b 就是我在右边得到的值。然后我必须掩盖这个。所以如果我掩盖了它，那么 x = 2 剩下的就是 8 1 / 2 1。所以这就是该方法在实践中的执行方式。本质上，写得最少。现在，当你得到几个变量时，这样做就变得方便多了。

It’s focused on the value x = 2. And b is what I’m getting on the right hand side. And then I have to cover up this. So if I cover up that, then what’s left over with x = 2 is again, 8 1 / 2 1. So this is the way the method gets carried out in practice. Writing, essentially, the least you can. Now, when you get to several variables, it becomes just way more convenient to do this.

现在，让我回顾一下掩盖何时有效。如果 Q (x) 具有不同的线性因子，则此掩盖方法有效。因此，这里有两件事需要做。它必须完全分解，分母必须完全分解。分子的次数必须严格小于分母的次数。我在这里举个例子。例如，这也告诉了你设置的一般模式。

So now, let me just review when cover up works. So this cover up method works if Q ( x) has distinct linear factors. And, so you need two things here. It has to factor completely, the denominator has to factor completely. And the degree of the numerator has to be strictly less than the degree of the denominator. I’m going to give you an example here. So, for instance, and this tells you the general pattern of the setup also.

假设你有 x ^2 + 3x + 8。除以 (x 1) ( x 2) ( x + 5)。所以这里我要告诉你设置。设置将是 A / (x 1) + B / (x 2) + c / x + 5。它总会分解成某个数。所以无论你有多少因子，你都必须为每个因子代入一个项。

Say you had x ^2 + 3x + 8, let’s say. Over (x 1) ( x 2)( x + 5). So here I’m going to tell you the setup. The setup is going to be A / (x 1) + B / (x 2) + c / x + 5. And it will always break up into something. So however many factors you have, you’ll have to put in a term for each of those.

然后你可以通过这种掩盖方法找到这里的每个数字。现在我们完成了。现在我们必须继续处理代数问题。那么第一个典型的代数问题是什么。它将是重根或重因数。让我在这里找一个不会显得非常难看的问题。

And then you can find each number here by this cover up method. Now we’re done with that. And now we have to go on to the algebraic complications. So would the first typical algebraic complication be. It would be repeated roots or repeated factors. Let me get one that doesn’t come out to be extremely ugly here.

这就是我们所说的示例 2。当次数总是需要分子次数小于分母次数时，这种方法就会奏效。Q 现在有重复的线性因子。让我们看看我想展示哪个示例。让我们在这里给出这个。我只需要重复分母。像这样一个额外的因子。

So this is what we’ll call Example 2. And this is going to work when the degree, you always need that the degree of the numerator is less than the degree of the denominator. And Q has now repeated linear factors. So let’s see which example I wanted to show you. So let’s just give this here. I’ll just repeat the denominator. With an extra factor like this.

现在，你需要知道最重要的事情，因为我已经为你完成了因式分解。已经执行了第 1 步。这是这里的第 1 步。你必须把所有的事情都分解，这已经为你完成了。这就是这个设置。设置的形式是 A / (x 1) + B / (x 1) ^2。我们需要这里平方的另一个项。+ C / (x + 2)。

Now, the main thing you need to know, since I’ve already performed the factorization for you. Already performed Step 1. This is Step 1 here. You have to factor things all the way, and that’s already been done for you. And here’s what this setup is. The setup is that it’s of the form A / (x 1) + B / (x 1) ^2. We need another term for the square here. + C / (x + 2).

一般来说，如果你有更多的幂，你只需要继续输入这些幂。每个幂都需要一个。为什么必须平方？好的。好问题。那么我到底为什么要这样做呢？让我给你一个提示，说明我为什么要这样做。这非常非常像数字的十进制扩展，或者说数字的 2 进制扩展。

In general, if you have more powers you just need to keep on putting in those powers. You need one for each of the powers. Why does it have to be squared? OK. Good question. So why in the world am I doing this? Let me just give you one hint as to why I’m doing this. It’s very, very much like the decimal expansion of a number or, say, the base 2 expansion of a number.

例如，7/16 等于 0 / 2 + 1 / 2 ^2 + 1/2 ^3 +，对吗？所以等于 4/16 + 1/2 ^4。就是这种东西。我得到了这个幂和那个幂。如果我有更高的幂，我就必须得到更多。所以当我有 2 ^ 4 时就会发生这种情况。我必须表示这样的事物。

So, for, example the number 7/16 is 0 / 2 + 1 / 2 ^2 + 1/2 ^3 +, is that right? So it’s 4/16 + 1/2 ^4. It’s this sort of thing. And I’m getting this power and this power. If I have higher powers, I’m going to have to have more and more. So this is what happens when I have a 2 ^ 4. I have to represent things like this.

这就是这篇文章中重复的内容。关于幂。这只是一个类比。关于我们正在做的事情。是的，这里还有一个问题。学生：教授：是的。所以这是一个例子，但它是为了代表一般情况，我也会给你一个大概的画面。当然，一旦你有了这里的第二个幂，你就需要这里提到的第一个和第二个幂。

That’s what’s coming out of this piece with the repetitious here. Of the powers. This is just an analogy. Of what we’re doing. Yeah, another question over here. STUDENT: PROFESSOR: Yes. 因为这里只有一次幂，所以我只需要提到那里的一次幂。如果这里的数字是 3，那么分母中就会多一个项，即 x 1 ^2 的项。这就是你刚才说的。好的，现在，这个设置的不同之处在于，虽然掩盖方法有效，但效果不太好。效果不太好。

And since there’s only a first power over here I only have to mention a first power over there.
